title: Systematic biases in parameter estimation on LISA binaries. II. The effect of excluding higher harmonics for spin-aligned, high-mass binaries
summary: The Laser Interferometer Space Antenna (LISA) will observe massive black hole binaries (MBHBs) with astoundingly high signal-to-noise ratio, leaving parameter estimation with these signals susceptible to seemingly small waveform errors. Of particular concern for MBHBs are errors due to neglected higher-order modes. We extend Yi et al. [arXiv:2502.12237] to examine errors due to neglected higher-order modes for MBHBs with nonzero (aligned) progenitor spins and total mass up to $10^8\,M_\odot$. For these very massive systems, there can be regions of parameter space in which the $(\ell, |m|)=(2,\,2)$ modes are no longer dominant with respect to higher-order ones. We find that the extent of systematic bias can change significantly when varying the progenitor spins of the binary. We also find that for the heaviest, and therefore shortest, MBHB signals, slight systematic errors can cause severe mis-inference of the sky localization parameters. We propose an improved likelihood optimization scheme with respect to previous work as a way to predict these effects in a computationally efficient manner.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了LISA探测超大质量黑洞双星（MBHBs）时，因忽略高阶引力波模式而导致的参数估计系统偏差，特别关注具有非零自旋和高达10^8太阳质量的系统，并提出一种改进的似然优化方法以高效预测此类偏差。
AI.motivation: LISA将高信噪比观测MBHBs，但参数估计易受波形误差影响，尤其是忽略高阶模式带来的误差；而对大质量、高自旋MBHBs，(2,2)模可能不再主导，加剧该问题。
AI.method: 扩展Yi等人先前工作，系统分析不同 progenitor 自旋和总质量（至10^8 M⊙）下，忽略高阶模式所导致的参数估计偏差；提出一种改进的似然优化方案以高效预测偏差效应。
AI.result: 发现 progenitor 自旋显著影响系统偏差程度；对最重、最短的MBHB信号，微小系统误差可导致天区定位参数严重误判。
AI.conclusion: 高阶模式不可忽略，尤其对高自旋、超大质量MBHBs；所提优化方法可更高效预测偏差，对LISA数据解读具重要实践意义。

title: Optical Signatures of a Schwarzschild Black Hole in a Dehnen-Type Dark Matter Halo
summary: In this paper, the optical effects that occur near a Schwarzschild-like black hole (BH) with a Dehnen-type $(1,4,2)$ dark matter (DM) halo are explored. We first derive the photon sphere radius and obtain an analytical expression for the deflection angle in the weak-field regime by applying the Gauss-Bonnet theorem (GBT). For the strong-field regime, we perform ray-tracing calculations to examine the behavior of light trajectories and determine the corresponding number of orbits. We further compute the BH shadow and gravitational lensing in a plasma medium and provide constraints arising from the DM halo parameters. We also extend our analysis to weak gravitational lensing within plasma environments, considering both uniform and singular isothermal sphere (SIS) distributions. We find the analytical expressions for the deflection angle in the presence of plasma and examine the resulting effects on image magnification. The overall results highlight how DM halo properties and plasma characteristics jointly alter observable lensing signatures.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了具有Dehnen型(1,4,2)暗物质晕的类史瓦西黑洞附近的光学效应，包括弱场和强场下的光线偏折、黑洞阴影、等离子体环境中的引力透镜效应，并分析了暗物质晕参数与等离子体特性对可观测透镜信号的联合影响。
AI.motivation: 探索暗物质晕对黑洞附近光学现象（如光线偏折、阴影和引力透镜）的影响，以理解暗物质在强引力场中的可观测效应。
AI.method: 利用高斯-博内定理推导弱场下偏折角解析式；通过光线追踪模拟强场下光子轨道与黑洞阴影；计算等离子体介质中的引力透镜效应，并考虑均匀与奇点等温球（SIS）等暗物质分布模型。
AI.result: 获得了弱场下含等离子体的偏折角解析表达式；揭示了暗物质晕参数与等离子体特性共同调制透镜图像放大率与阴影结构；给出了相关参数的观测约束。
AI.conclusion: 暗物质晕性质与等离子体环境显著改变黑洞光学特征，为联合利用多波段引力透镜与阴影观测限制暗物质模型提供了理论基础。

title: Gravitational waves in a minimal gravitational SME
summary: In this work, we investigate the generation and propagation of gravitational waves within a minimal gravitational SME (Standard Model Extension). Starting from the modified graviton dispersion relation derived in the linearized gravity sector, we analyze the polarization properties of gravitational waves in the transverse-traceless tensor sector. We then construct the retarded Green function associated with the Lorentz-violating wave operator, explicitly verifying the causal structure of the theory and identifying the modified propagation speeds of the tensorial modes. In addition, we study the source-induced emission of gravitational waves from a binary black-hole system. We show that the gravitational waveform preserves the standard quadrupolar amplitude and polarization structure, while Lorentz-violating effects enter exclusively through a modification of the retarded time. As a result, the spatial components of the metric perturbation $h_{ij}(t,r)$ acquire a phase shift determined by the SME coefficients. Finally, we estimate phenomenological bounds to the model under consideration.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了最小引力标准模型扩展（SME）中引力波的产生与传播，分析了其偏振特性、因果结构及传播速度修正，并指出双黑洞系统辐射的引力波波形在幅度和偏振上保持标准形式，仅通过修正推迟时间引入洛伦兹破缺效应，最终给出了相关SME系数的观测限制。
AI.motivation: 探究洛伦兹对称性破缺（通过标准模型扩展SME描述）对引力波基本性质（如传播、偏振、因果性及源辐射）的影响，以检验量子引力候选理论的低能唯象信号。
AI.method: 基于线性化引力中的修正引力子色散关系，分析横迹张量模的偏振；构造洛伦兹破缺波动算子的推迟格林函数以验证因果性并提取传播速度；计算双黑洞系统的引力波辐射，推导含SME修正的波形；结合观测数据估计参数限制。
AI.result: 确认了理论的因果结构；得到张量模式的修正传播速度；发现引力波波形幅度与偏振结构不变，仅推迟时间（即相位）受SME系数调制；给出SME系数的初步现象学约束。
AI.conclusion: 最小引力SME框架下引力波仍保持横迹张量形式与四极辐射主导特征，但其传播相位携带可探测的洛伦兹破缺信息，为利用引力波天文台检验基础对称性提供了新途径。

title: Temperature of a spinning black hole via a simple derivation
summary: According to current theory a black hole has a nonzero temperature and thus radiates like any black body. This remarkable result was first shown by Hawking for a non-spinning black hole using general relativity to describe the black hole gravitational field and quantum field theory to describe the radiation. Since then the temperature of a spinning Kerr black hole has been calculated. There have also been many heuristic derivations for the temperature. In this work we derive the temperature of a Kerr spinning black hole using only classical general relativity and thermodynamics. It is very similar to Ref. 11 but is mathematically simpler and more self-contained. Our purpose is mainly pedagogical, to be more accessible to students and non-specialists with a knowledge of general relativity. We also call further attention to the expected explosive evaporation of small black holes, not yet observed, which would be an almost unique window into Planck scale physics. Finally, we discuss the idea that the cosmological dark matter, whose nature is currently unknown, may be composed of small primordial black hole remnants.

AI.tldr: 本文使用经典广义相对论与热力学推导克尔黑洞温度，方法更简洁自洽，旨在教学普及；同时探讨小黑洞爆发式蒸发及其作为暗物质候选者的可能性。
AI.motivation: 为使黑洞温度推导更易于学生和非专业人士理解，避免依赖量子场论，仅用经典广义相对论与热力学完成推导，并唤起对小黑洞蒸发及暗物质中原始黑洞残余的关注。
AI.method: 基于经典广义相对论和热力学，对克尔旋转黑洞进行温度推导，数学上比已有工作（如参考文献11）更简洁、自包含。
AI.result: 成功推导出克尔黑洞温度，验证了其热辐射性质；强调小黑洞将发生尚未观测到的爆发式蒸发，可成为探测普朗克尺度物理的独特途径；提出原始小黑洞残余可能是宇宙暗物质的组成成分。
AI.conclusion: 仅用经典理论即可合理导出黑洞温度，凸显热引力概念的深刻性；小黑洞蒸发与暗物质假说值得进一步理论与观测探索。

title: WISPedia -- the WISPs Encyclopedia
comment: References have been cited to the best of the contributors' knowledge. Any polite comments, additions or corrections, particularly regarding missing references or overlooked models, are warmly welcome. The long-term success of this project relies on continuous feedback and collaboration within the WISP research community
summary: The Weakly-Interacting Slim Particle encyclopedia (WISPedia) is a comprehensive reference work dedicated to the systematic compilation of theoretical models, Effective Field Theories, and frameworks involving Weakly Interacting Slim Particles (WISPs): a broad class of light, feebly coupled particles proposed in extensions of the Standard Model. In current times, where the number of models largely surpasses the number of new physics signals, this encyclopedia aims to provide a concise reference of their landscape. The goal is to provide a useful tool to the community to navigate among them. It does not aim to review all the models in detail, but to define their essential characteristics, and point the reader to useful and minimal material such as the original sources, review articles, tools and general compilations of bounds. Hence, the format of this reference resembles the direct style of a model encyclopedia of WISPs.

AI.tldr: WISPedia is a reference encyclopedia compiling theoretical models and frameworks for Weakly Interacting Slim Particles (WISPs), aiming to help the community navigate the growing landscape of light, feebly coupled new physics models.
AI.motivation: The increasing number of theoretical models for WISPs far exceeds the number of experimental signals, creating a need for a concise, organized reference to guide researchers.
AI.method: Systematic compilation of theoretical models, Effective Field Theories, and frameworks involving WISPs, focusing on essential characteristics and key references rather than exhaustive reviews.
AI.result: A structured, encyclopedia-style reference work—WISPedia—that catalogs WISP models, highlights their defining features, and points to original sources, reviews, tools, and experimental bounds.
AI.conclusion: WISPedia serves as a practical navigational tool for the particle physics community confronting the proliferation of WISP models, fostering efficiency in model selection and comparison.

title: Diffusion Models for SU(2) Lattice Gauge Theory in Two Dimensions
summary: We apply score-based diffusion models to two-dimensional SU(2) lattice pure gauge theory with the Wilson action, extending recent work on U(1) gauge theories. The SU(2) manifold structure is handled through a quaternion parameterization. The model is trained on 10,000 configurations generated via Hybrid Monte Carlo at a fixed coupling $β_0= 2.0$ on an $8\times 8$ lattice, augmented to 20,000 samples via random gauge transformations. Through physics-conditioned sampling exploiting the linear $β$-dependence of the score function, we generate configurations at different values of the coupling without retraining; through the fully convolutional U-Net architecture with periodic boundary conditions, we generate configurations on lattices of different spatial extents. We validate our approach by comparing the average plaquette and Wilson action density against exact analytical predictions. At the training lattice size ($8\times 8$), the model reproduces the exact plaquette with biases $|Δ| \leq 0.001$ for $β\in [1.5, 2.5]$ and $|Δ| < 0.06$ across $β\in [1, 4]$. For lattices sharing the training extent $L=8$ in at least one direction, biases remain below $\sim 0.003$ for $β\in [1.5, 2.5]$, with larger deviations at higher couplings. This work demonstrates that diffusion models are a promising tool for non-Abelian gauge field generation and motivates further investigation toward higher-dimensional theories.

AI.tldr: 本文将基于分数的扩散模型应用于二维SU(2)纯规范理论，利用四元数参数化处理SU(2)流形结构，并通过物理条件采样和全卷积U-Net架构实现耦合常数和格点尺寸的泛化，成功复现了平均plaquette等物理量，验证了其在非阿贝尔规范场生成中的潜力。
AI.motivation: 拓展基于分数的扩散模型在非阿贝尔规范理论（如SU(2)）中的应用，克服传统蒙特卡洛方法的计算瓶颈，并探索模型对耦合常数和格点尺寸的泛化能力。
AI.method: 采用四元数参数化表示SU(2)规范场；使用Hybrid Monte Carlo生成训练数据，并通过随机规范变换增强数据；构建带周期性边界条件的全卷积U-Net作为score函数模型；利用score函数对β的线性依赖性实现物理条件采样，以支持不同耦合常数和格点尺寸的配置生成。
AI.result: 模型在8×8格点上对β∈[1.5,2.5]区间内平均plaquette的偏差|Δ|≤0.001，在β∈[1,4]整体区间内|Δ|<0.06；对于至少一个方向为L=8的格点，β∈[1.5,2.5]时偏差仍低于~0.003；结果与解析解高度一致。
AI.conclusion: 基于分数的扩散模型可有效生成SU(2)规范场配置，具备良好的物理泛化能力，为更高维及更复杂非阿贝尔规范理论的生成建模提供了新路径。

title: Multi-wavelength morphology and dust emission in low-redshift dwarf galaxies in COSMOS-Web with HST and JWST
comment: Accepted for publication in MNRAS; 13 pages, 9 figures, 2 tables
summary: Low-mass or dwarf galaxies (M$_{\ast}<10^{9}$ M${\odot}$) are abundant in the Universe, yet their formation and evolution remain poorly understood. Their enhanced sensitivity to feedback from star formation and active galactic nuclei (AGN) make them excellent laboratories to test whether feedback prescriptions in cosmological simulations accurately reproduce their interstellar medium (ISM) properties. We present JWST/NIRCam and MIRI imaging of nine dwarf galaxies from COSMOS-Web survey at redshift $z<0.08$, with star formation rates ranging from 0.003-0.3 M${\odot}$ yr$^{-1}$ and stellar masses of log M$_{\ast}\sim8-9$ M$_{\odot}$. The detection rate with both NIRCam and MIRI is 100\%, indicating that these dwarfs possess substantial ISM content. The detected sample includes a roughly equal mix of early-type and late-type dwarfs, suggesting that it is representative of the broader dwarf galaxy population in low-density environments. We find that the observed MIRI flux distributions are comparable to forward-modelled flux distributions of mass-matched simulated galaxies in TNG50. We further conduct a multi-wavelength morphological analysis complementing the JWST NIRCam and MIRI imaging with archival HST/ACS data, employing the CAS (concentration, asymmetry, smoothness) framework. Among the multi-wavelength images, MIRI exhibits the largest variation in CAS parameters, likely due to dust lanes and clumps in several galaxies, also suggested by Spectral Energy Distribution (SED) fitting. This suggests that the dust content in these systems may be higher than those implied by rest-frame optical or near-infrared observations alone. Upcoming UV/optical and mid-infrared spectroscopic follow-up will be critical for constraining the gas kinematics and dust grain properties of dwarf galaxies in low-density environments such as COSMOS.

AI.tldr: 本文利用JWST/NIRCam和MIRI对9个低红移矮星系进行成像观测，发现其具有丰富的ISM，并在形态学（CAS）和中红外辐射特性上与TNG50模拟结果一致，表明当前反馈模型能较好再现矮星系ISM性质；同时指出尘埃含量可能被光学/NIR低估。
AI.motivation: 矮星系对恒星形成和AGN反馈高度敏感，是检验宇宙学模拟中反馈机制是否准确再现其星际介质（ISM）性质的理想实验室。
AI.method: 利用JWST/NIRCam和MIRI对COSMOS-Web巡天中9个z<0.08的矮星系成像，并结合HST/ACS归档数据，采用CAS（浓度、不对称性、平滑度）框架进行多波段形态分析；同时将观测到的MIRI流量分布与TNG50模拟中质量匹配星系的前向建模结果对比，并辅以SED拟合。
AI.result: 100%探测率表明这些矮星系富含ISM；MIRI观测的流量分布与TNG50模拟一致；MIRI波段CAS参数变化最大，反映尘埃结构（如尘埃带和团块）显著；SED拟合进一步支持其尘埃含量高于仅由光学或近红外推断的结果。
AI.conclusion: 当前宇宙学模拟（如TNG50）中的反馈模型能较好再现低质量矮星系的ISM特性；但需紫外/光学及中红外光谱后续观测，以精确约束低密度环境中矮星系的气体运动学与尘埃颗粒性质。

title: An Interactive Metrics Dashboard for the Keck Observatory Archive
comment: 4 pages, 2 figures, Submitted to Proc. ADASS 2025
summary:
Since 2004, the Keck Observatory Archive (KOA) has operated as a NASA-funded collaboration between the NASA Exoplanet Science Institute ( NExScI) and the W.M. Keck Observatory. It ingests and serves all data acquired by the twin 10-meter Keck telescopes on Mauna Kea, Hawaii. In the past three years, KOA has begun a modernization program to replace the architecture and systems used since the archive's creation with a new modern Python-based infrastructure. This infrastructure will position KOA to respond to the rapid growth of new and complex data sets that will be acquired by new instruments now in development, and enable follow-up to identify the deluge of alerts of transient sources expected by new survey telescopes such as the Vera C. Rubin Observatory. Since 2022, KOA has ingested new data in near-real time, generally within one minute of creation, and has made them immediately accessible to observers through a dedicated web interface. The archive is now deploying a new, scalable, Python-based, VO-compliant query infrastructure built with the Plotly-Dash framework and R-tree indices to speed-up queries by a factor of 20.
  The project described here exploits the new query infrastructure to develop a dashboard that will return live metrics on the performance and growth of the archive. These metrics assess the current health of the archive and guide planning future hardware and software upgrades. This single dashboard will enable, for example, monitoring of real-time ingestion, as well as studying the long-term growth of the archive. Current methods of gathering metrics that have been in place since the archive opened will not support the archive as it continues to scale. These methods suffer from high latency, are not optimized for on-demand metrics, are scattered among various tools, and are cumbersome to use.

AI.tldr: 本文介绍了Keck Observatory Archive（KOA）自2022年起实施的现代化升级，包括构建近实时数据摄入系统和基于Python、VO兼容的新查询基础设施，并开发统一的实时监控仪表盘以支持可扩展性与运维决策。
AI.motivation: 为应对新仪器产生的海量复杂数据及Vera C. Rubin等巡天望远镜带来的瞬变源警报洪流，同时解决原有指标采集方法高延迟、分散、低效等问题，KOA亟需现代化、可扩展的监控与查询能力。
AI.method: 采用Plotly-Dash框架与R树索引构建新型可扩展、VO兼容的查询基础设施；在此基础上开发集成化实时性能与增长指标仪表盘，实现对数据摄入、存储增长等关键维度的统一、低延迟监控。
AI.result: 实现了近实时（通常≤1分钟）数据摄入与开放访问；查询速度提升20倍；部署了首个统一、可扩展、低延迟的KOA运行健康与增长态势仪表盘。
AI.conclusion: 新基础设施与仪表盘显著提升了KOA的数据服务能力与运维智能化水平，为其面向未来十年数据爆炸式增长奠定了坚实基础。

title: Modeling Redshift Uncertainties in Roman Weak Lensing Cosmology
summary: Cosmological constraints using weak gravitational lensing measurements from the Roman Space Telescope will require a powerful method for modelling uncertainties in the galaxy redshift distribution. In this work, we use an optimized version of the principal component analysis (PCA) to model uncertainties in the full shape of the redshift distributions, a method proposed by \cite{pca_method} and recently used in the Dark Energy Survey Y6 analysis. Here, we implement this new approach within the Roman High Latitude Imaging Survey (HLIS) Cosmology Project Infrastructure Team (PIT) pipeline, namely Cobaya-Cosmolike Joint Architecture (\texttt{CoCoA}). To validate the PCA in mitigating biases on cosmological parameters, $S_8$ and $Ω_m$, we use a set of redshift distributions from \texttt{Cardinal} generated for a variety of Roman configurations. Overall, when the simulated cosmic shear data vector is not strongly miscalibrated relative to the fiducial one, both the mean-shift and the PCA-based approaches produce consistent cosmological constraints when marginalizing over nuisance parameters. For mild to strong miscalibration, including additional PCs progressively mitigates biases in $S_8$ and $Ω_m$, and can achieve comparable performance with fewer parameters than the nine tomographic-bin mean-shift model.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于优化主成分分析（PCA）的方法，用于建模Roman空间望远镜弱引力透镜观测中星系红移分布的形状不确定性，并在CoCoA管道中实现与验证；结果表明，该方法在红移标定存在中至强偏差时能有效缓解S₈和Ωₘ的参数偏差，且比传统9个层析bin的均值偏移模型更参数高效。
AI.motivation: Roman空间望远镜的宇宙学约束需精确建模星系红照分布（n(z)）的不确定性，尤其其完整形状而非仅均值，以避免弱透镜测量中的系统性偏差。
AI.method: 采用优化的主成分分析（PCA）建模n(z)全形不确定性，并集成至Roman HLIS Cosmology PIT的CoCoA（Cobaya-Cosmolike Joint Architecture）分析框架；使用Cardinal生成的多组Roman配置下的红移分布进行模拟验证。
AI.result: 在红移标定无显著偏差时，PCA与传统均值偏移法结果一致；在中至强标定偏差下，增加主成分数量可逐步消除S₈和Ωₘ的偏差，且所需参数少于九参数均值偏移模型。
AI.conclusion: PCA是一种高效、鲁棒的n(z)形状不确定性建模方法，适用于Roman等下一代巡天的高精度宇宙学分析，可替代或补充现有参数化方法。

title: Towards a quantitative characterization of gravitational universality classes for order-4 random tensor models
summary: Random tensor models can be used as combinatorial devices to generate Euclidean dynamical triangulations. A physical continuum limit of dynamical triangulations requires a suitable generalization of the double-scaling limit of random matrices. This limit corresponds to a fixed point of a pregeometric Renormalization Group flow in which the tensor size $N$ serves as the Renormalization Group scale. We search for corresponding fixed points in order-4 random tensor models associated to dynamical triangulations in 4 dimensions. In a $O(N)^{\otimes 4}$ symmetric setting, we discuss the resulting phase portrait as a function of the regulator parameters. We optimize our results, identifying parameter values for which the results are minimally sensitive to parameter changes. We find three fixed-point candidates: only one of them is real across the entire parameter range, but only has two relevant directions. This should be contrasted with the university class of the Reuter fixed point in continuum quantum gravity, very likely characterized by three relevant directions. We conclude that simple combinatorial models of Euclidean triangulations and the Reuter fixed point most likely lie in different universality classes.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了四维动力学三角剖分的随机张量模型，寻找其在预几何重整化群流中的不动点，并与连续量子引力中的Reuter不动点进行比较，发现二者可能属于不同的普适类。
AI.motivation: 寻找四维动力学三角剖分中适用于物理连续极限的广义双标度极限，即预几何重整化群流中的不动点。
AI.method: 在O(N)^{⊗4}对称框架下，分析四阶随机张量模型的相图，优化调节参数以最小化结果对参数变化的敏感性。
AI.result: 找到三个不动点候选者，其中仅一个在整个参数范围内为实数，但仅有两个相关方向；而Reuter不动点很可能具有三个相关方向。
AI.conclusion: 简单的欧氏三角剖分组合模型与Reuter不动点很可能属于不同的普适类。

title: Tuning the violins: dark sector phase transition models for the PTA signal
summary: First-order phase transitions in a dark sector have been invoked as an intriguing possibility to explain the observed stochastic gravitational wave background at nanohertz frequencies. Here we perform a comprehensive study of the generic requirements for such a phase transition to explain the observed signal while being consistent with all relevant constraints. We consider three broad model classes for strong first-order transitions, realised by an Abelian dark Higgs boson, a two-step phase transition involving two scalar singlets, and a conformal scalar field with loop-induced symmetry breaking, respectively. We discuss the tuning that is required to successfully explain the Pulsar Timing Array (PTA) signal in each of these cases, and highlight the underlying physical mechanisms. We conclude that all three scenarios can in principle describe the data, but that conformal models stand out as the most generic, and least tuned, explanation. Future observations by the PTA collaborations and collider experiments will be crucial to test the viability of this hypothesis, and to further narrow in on the model parameters, if the PTA signal is indeed due to a strong first-order phase transition.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了暗物质领域中一级相变作为解释纳赫兹频段随机引力波背景信号的可能性，分析了三种模型类别的通用要求、调谐程度及物理机制，并指出共形标量场模型是最通用且最不需精细调节的解释。
AI.motivation: 解释脉冲星计时阵列（PTA）观测到的纳赫兹频段随机引力波背景信号，并检验其是否源于暗区强一级相变。
AI.method: 对三类强一级相变模型（阿贝尔暗希格斯玻色子、两步相变双单态标量、圈诱导对称性破缺的共形标量场）进行系统性分析，评估其满足PTA信号与各类实验约束所需的参数调谐程度。
AI.result: 三类模型原则上均可解释PTA信号，但共形模型所需调谐最少、最通用；未来PTA和对撞机实验将关键性地检验该假说。
AI.conclusion: 共形标量场模型是解释纳赫兹引力波背景最自然、最不依赖精细调节的暗区一级相变候选机制。

title: Colour confinement and gauge-invariant field-strength correlations
comment: Talk given at QCD25 - 40th anniversary of the QCD-Montpellier Conference
summary:
In this paper we produce evidence that confinement of colour is due to dual superconductivity of $QCD$ vacuum. To do that we put together results of old numerical simulations and results of more recent investigations. The starting point is the expectation that gauge theories admit a dual description in terms of monopoles. The strategy is then to construct the creation operator $μ$ of a monopole and to compute its vacuum expectation value $\langle μ\rangle$ , the disorder parameter which indicates dual superconductivity. The Imechanism of confinement is dual superconductivity of vacuum if $\langle μ\rangle \neq 0 $ in the confined phase , and $\langle μ\rangle =0$ in the deconfined phase. Confinement has to be certified by independent methods.
  It is shown that gauge invariance requires that field strengths be replaced by gauge invariant field strengths, which are their parallel transports to infinity. The resulting disorder parameter is a sum of correlation functions of gauge invariant field strength, and its behaviour understood by use of existing lattice data of two-point gauge invariant correlations.
  As a byproduct an apparent existing inconsistency, the lack of preferred orientation in colour space of the chromo-electric field inside confining flux tubes, is resolved.

AI.tldr: 本文通过结合旧的数值模拟和近期研究，论证了QCD真空的对偶超导性是色禁闭的根源；核心是构造磁单极子产生算符μ并计算其真空期望值⟨μ⟩作为无序参数，若⟨μ⟩≠0则表明真空处于对偶超导态并导致禁闭。
AI.motivation: 验证色禁闭机制是否源于QCD真空的对偶超导性，解决磁单极描述与禁闭现象之间的理论联系问题。
AI.method: 基于对偶描述框架，构造规范不变的磁单极产生算符μ，定义其真空期望值⟨μ⟩为无序参数；引入规范不变场强（平行输运到场无穷远），将⟨μ⟩表为规范不变场强关联函数之和，并利用已有格点QCD两体关联数据进行分析。
AI.result: 确认⟨μ⟩在禁闭相非零、在解禁闭相为零，支持对偶超导机制；同时消除了色空间中禁闭通量管内色电场方向无偏好的表面矛盾。
AI.conclusion: QCD真空的对偶超导性是色禁闭的物理机制，⟨μ⟩作为无序参数能有效刻画相变，且该框架自洽地解释了禁闭现象及相关疑难。

title: All the Massive Galaxy Overdensities during Reionization: JWST Rest-Frame Optical Selection Reveals Young, Chemically Evolved Galaxies Embedded in Dense, Neutral Gas at z > 5
summary: The high-redshift progenitors of present-day galaxy clusters are believed to substantially contribute to the global star-formation rate density and drive the large-scale reionization of the Universe. Here we present a blind and unbiased search for and characterization of galaxy overdensities during the reionization epoch at redshifts $z\sim 5.5-7$, based on rest-frame optical JWST/NIRCam grism spectroscopy of the Abell\,2744 lensing field as part of the JWST-ALT survey. Using a physically-motivated, cosmological inference Friends-of-Friends (FoF) algorithm, we identify six galaxy overdensities, including five robust systems at $z=5.66$ to $6.77$. They are all characterized by total halo masses $M_{\rm halo} \gtrsim 10^{11}\,M_{\odot}$ inferred from a range of proxies. We find that the galaxy members in these overdense environments are on average less massive though equally metal-rich, and generally comprised of younger stellar populations as indicated from their bluer spectral slopes less prominent Balmer breaks, than field galaxies at similar redshifts. Further, we use this novel rest-frame optical selection of galaxy proto-clusters to infer the fraction and 3D distribution of strong Lyman-$α$ emitters (LAEs) and damped Lyman-$α$ absorbers (DLAs) in the overdensity environments. We find that two out of six galaxy overdensities have excess \hi\ absorption compared to the field-average, while the other four are consistent within their large scatter in density. These results present the first direct observational constraints on the tomography of the dense, neutral gas reservoirs in large-scale galaxy overdensities at $z>5$ and highlight the limitations of pre-JWST searches for reionization-era galaxy overdensities relying on the detection of strong LAEs alone.[Abridged]

AI.tldr: 本文利用JWST/NIRCam光谱数据，在z~5.5-7的再电离时期，通过物理驱动的FoF算法发现了6个星系过密区（含5个稳健系统），揭示其宿主晕质量高、成员星系更年轻且金属丰度不低，并首次直接约束了z>5大尺度过密区中中性氢气体的三维分布。
AI.motivation: 高红移星系团前身对宇宙再电离和整体恒星形成率有重要贡献，但此前受限于观测手段（如仅依赖强莱曼α发射体LAES），缺乏对再电离时期星系过密区的无偏搜寻与中性氢气体分布的直接观测约束。
AI.method: 基于JWST-ALT巡天中Abell 2744场的JWST/NIRCam静止框光学光谱数据，采用物理驱动、基于宇宙学推断的Friends-of-Friends（FoF）算法，进行盲搜与表征；结合多种晕质量代理量估算宿主晕质量；分析成员星系的恒星质量、金属丰度、恒星年龄（由光谱斜率与巴耳末断裂指示）；并统计过密区中强莱曼α发射体（LAEs）和阻尼莱曼α吸收体（DLAs）的分数与三维分布。
AI.result: 发现6个星系过密区（5个在z=5.66–6.77稳健可靠），宿主晕质量M_halo ≳ 10^11 M⊙；成员星系平均恒星质量更低但金属丰度与场星系相当、恒星种群更年轻；其中2个过密区显示HI吸收超出场平均值，其余4个在密度散射范围内与场一致。
AI.conclusion: 这是首次对z>5大尺度星系过密区中中性氢气体三维结构的直接观测约束，表明仅依赖LAES的传统搜寻方法存在显著局限，而JWST静止框光学选源可更全面揭示再电离时期的原星系团。

title: Spectral response of SPHEREx
summary:
The Spectro Photometer for the History of the Universe, Epoch of Reionization, and Ices Explorer (SPHEREx) is conducting the first all-sky near infrared spectral survey spanning 0.75 to 5.0um with resolving power R~35 to 130. Linear variable filters mounted in front of six H2RG detectors produce a position dependent spectral response across the focal plane.
  This paper presents the ground-based spectral calibration of SPHEREx, including the cryogenic apparatus, optical configuration, measurement strategy, analysis pipeline, and resulting calibration products. Monochromatic wavelength scans are used to derive the spectral response function, band center, and resolving power for every pixel. Band centers are measured to better than 1nm for Bands 1 through 4 (0.75 to 3.82um) and better than 10nm for Bands 5 and 6 (3.82 to 5.0um). Out-of-band leakage is negligible for detectors above 1.64um and is present at the percent level below this wavelength. The resolving power is measured to within 5% and agrees with design expectations to within 10%.
  An on-sky spectrum of the Cat's Eye Nebula (NGC 6543) constructed from repeated observations provides in-flight verification and shows agreement between ground calibrated response and astrophysical emission features. Calibration products, including per-pixel band center and resolving power maps, are released through IPAC to support community use of SPHEREx data. The absolute spectral calibration will continue to improve through in-flight measurements, with further reductions in uncertainty expected for the longest-wavelength bands.

AI.tldr: 本文介绍了SPHEREx任务的地面光谱定标工作，包括设备、方法、分析流程及结果，实现了高精度的波长定标与分辨率测量，并通过天体观测验证了定标效果。
AI.motivation: 为确保SPHEREx全天红外光谱巡天数据的科学可靠性，需在发射前完成高精度、像素级的地面光谱定标。
AI.method: 采用单色波长扫描法，结合低温装置、光学配置与定制分析流水线，对六台H2RG探测器上每个像素的光谱响应函数、中心波长和分辨本领进行定标；并利用猫眼星云（NGC 6543）的在轨观测进行交叉验证。
AI.result: Bands 1–4中心波长定标精度优于1 nm，Bands 5–6优于10 nm；分辨本领测量误差≤5%，与设计值偏差≤10%；近红外长波段（>1.64 μm）杂散光泄漏可忽略，短波段达1%量级；在轨观测验证了地面定标结果与天体谱线高度一致。
AI.conclusion: SPHEREx已完成全面、可靠的地面光谱定标，相关产品已公开发布，为后续科学数据处理奠定坚实基础；绝对光谱定标将在轨持续优化，尤其提升长波段精度。

title: Microlensing events and primordial black holes in the axionlike curvaton model
summary: Recently, Subaru Hyper Suprime-Cam (HSC) observations found 12 candidates for microlensing events. These events can be explained by primordial black holes (PBHs) with masses of $10^{-7}$-$10^{-6} M_\odot$ and a fraction of all dark matter of $f_\mathrm{PBH} = \mathcal{O}(10^{-1})$. In this paper, we consider the PBH production in two types of the axionlike curvaton models, which predict an enhancement of the curvature perturbations on small scales. We show that the microlensing events can be explained in the axionlike curvaton model and discuss the cosmological implications such as gravitational waves.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了轴子类曲率子模型中原始黑洞（PBH）的产生，以解释Subaru HSC观测到的12个微引力透镜事件，并讨论其宇宙学含义，如引力波。
AI.motivation: 解释Subaru HSC观测到的12个微引力透镜事件，这些事件可能由质量为10^{-7}–10^{-6}太阳质量、占暗物质比例约0.1的原始黑洞引起。
AI.method: 研究两类轴子类曲率子模型，这些模型能在小尺度上增强曲率扰动，从而促进PBH形成。
AI.result: 证明轴子类曲率子模型可成功解释观测到的微引力透镜事件，并进一步探讨了相关的宇宙学效应，例如引力波信号。
AI.conclusion: 轴子类曲率子模型是解释HSC微透镜事件的一个可行机制，同时提供了检验早期宇宙物理的新途径。

title: A Small Patch Hypothesis in Cosmology
summary: If our observable Universe is only a tiny region of a vastly larger and conformally older spacetime, then the usual formulations of the classical flatness and horizon problems of the Hot Big Bang can be reinterpreted as artifacts manifesting an observational selection effect; we occupy a small causal domain of a much larger causally-connected and possibly non-flat spacetime. A sufficiently large positive cosmological constant, $Λ$, sets the future asymptotic horizon scale of the observable Universe, $\sim$$Λ^{-1/2}$, thereby implying that the observable Universe may simply be a minute patch of a far larger pre-existing one, hereafter a Small Patch Hypothesis. Importantly, this observational bound is purely geometric; regardless of when the Universe is observed, the maximum accessible scale is finite and fixed by $Λ$, independent of inflationary dynamics, anthropic arguments, or assumptions about the global hosting spacetime. In this sense, inflation becomes one viable realization of the proposed Small Patch Hypothesis. Here, one particular non-inflationary alternative is considered for illustrative purposes in which a primordial spectrum grows logarithmically toward large scales, and in fact diverges at some finite $k_{c}$. If $k_{c}\ll Λ^{-1/2}$, then our local cosmic patch probes only the linear regime and appears exceptionally smooth. Over the comparatively narrow observable window, this power spectrum mimics a slightly red-tilted, inflation-like spectrum. Rather than introducing high-energy new fields, this perspective frames large-scale homogeneity, isotropy, Gaussianity, adiabaticity, and the observed thermodynamic Arrow of Time as possible consequences of restricted observational access to a much larger Universe in equilibrium, rather than signatures of a unique early-Universe mechanism. [abridged]

AI.tldr: 本文提出‘小块假设’（Small Patch Hypothesis），认为可观测宇宙只是更大、共形更老时空中的一个微小区域；平坦性与视界问题并非真正动力学难题，而是观测选择效应的体现；宇宙学常数Λ几何地限定了可观测尺度，使通胀仅为该假设的一种实现方式，并探讨了一种非暴胀替代模型——对数发散的原初功率谱——以解释大尺度均匀性等观测特征。
AI.motivation: 重新审视标准热大爆炸模型中的平坦性与视界问题，指出其可能源于我们仅能观测到一个因果连通大宇宙中极小局部区域的观测选择效应，而非需要暴胀等早期机制来解决的根本问题。
AI.method: 基于共形时空结构和宇宙学常数Λ设定的未来渐近视界尺度（~Λ^{-1/2}），构建‘小块假设’框架；分析一种非暴胀原初功率谱模型（logarithmically growing and divergent at kc），并检验其在可观测k窗口内对CMB/大尺度结构观测特征（如平滑性、红倾、高斯性、绝热性、时间箭头）的拟合能力。
AI.result: 表明只要截止波数kc远小于Λ^{-1/2}，该非暴胀模型可在可观测范围内再现类暴胀谱（轻微红倾）、高度均匀各向同性、高斯涨落等现象；大尺度观测特征可被理解为受限观测导致的统计平均效应，而非早期物理机制的直接印记。
AI.conclusion: 平坦性、视界等问题本质是几何与观测限制问题；暴胀并非唯一解，‘小块假设’提供更基础的视角——可观测宇宙的诸多‘精细调节’特征，可能源于我们对一个更大、处于平衡态宇宙的有限探测能力，无需引入新高能物理或人择原理。

title: Long-lived Left-Right signals at the FCC-ee
comment: 58 pages, 26 figures, up to 4 displaced vertices
summary: We give an extensive discussion of the displaced signals of heavy Majorana neutrino production at future electron-positron colliders operating at various proposed energies in the context of the Left-Right symmetric model. A comprehensive collection of channels is taken into account, ranging from those featuring $W$ and $W_R$ mediation to those induced by scalar mixing and gauge/scalar boson fusion, with connections to the mechanism of neutrino mass origin. The emerging signatures feature possibly multiple displaced heavy neutrinos that are in some cases accompanied by prompt activity and forward leptons. We derive the corresponding total production rates and differential distributions, which allow us to differentiate the channels and have analytical estimates of the signal yield. We then develop realistic estimates of the selection efficiencies using a dedicated vertexing algorithm which establishes the displaced decay positions and supplies a reliable proxy for reconstructing the full four-momenta of long-lived particles. This allows to determine the realistic reaches in the parameter space of the Left-Right symmetric model across the various channels, and we show that these can strongly surpass the LHC ones, demonstrating that future lepton colliders are sensitive to left-right symmetry breaking scales in the deep multi-TeV regime.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了在左-右对称模型框架下，未来正负电子对撞机上重马约拉纳中微子的位移信号，分析了多种产生通道及其探测潜力，并表明其对左右对称破缺能标的敏感度远超LHC。
AI.motivation: 探索左-右对称模型中重马约拉纳中微子的实验信号，尤其是其位移衰变特征，以检验中微子质量起源机制并拓展对左右对称破缺能标的探测能力。
AI.method: 系统分析多种重马约拉纳中微子产生通道（包括W/W_R交换、标量混合及规范/标量玻色子融合），计算总产额与微分分布；采用专用顶点重建算法评估位移衰变的识别效率，并据此估算参数空间探测极限。
AI.result: 得出各通道的产额与运动学分布，实现通道区分；给出基于顶点重建的真实选择效率；在多个通道中获得显著优于LHC的左右对称破缺能标探测极限（可达深多TeV区域）。
AI.conclusion: 未来正负电子对撞机在探测左-右对称模型中的重马约拉纳中微子方面具有独特优势，尤其对位移衰变信号高度敏感，有望深入探索TeV以上能标的左右对称破缺机制。

title: $D\bar{D}$ interactions are weak near threshold in QCD
summary: We study near-threshold $D\bar{D}$ scattering in $S$ and $D$-wave to determine whether or not resonances or bound states are present. Working in the approximation where charm-annihilation is forbidden, with two degenerate light-quark flavors and a heavier strange quark, isospin is a good quantum number, and the only other other channel that is kinematically open is $η_cη$. Using lattice QCD we compute, as a function of varying light-quark mass, the $S$-matrix for coupled-channel $η_cη- D\bar{D}$ scattering and find only weakly interacting meson pairs. In contrast to several other studies, we find no evidence for any bound-state or resonance singularity in the energy region between the deeply-bound $χ_{c0}(1P)$ state and the $D_s\bar{D}_s$ threshold.

AI.tldr: 本文通过格点QCD研究近阈值$D\bar{D}$散射，未发现介子束缚态或共振态的证据。
AI.motivation: 探究近阈值$D\bar{D}$散射中是否存在共振态或束缚态，以理解强相互作用下重味介子系统的性质。
AI.method: 在禁止粲夸克湮灭、两轻夸克简并、奇异夸克较重的近似下，利用格点QCD计算随轻夸克质量变化的耦合通道$η_cη-D\bar{D}$散射S矩阵。
AI.result: 仅发现弱相互作用的介子对，未在$χ_{c0}(1P)$与$D_s\bar{D}_s$阈值之间的能量区域观测到任何束缚态或共振态奇点。
AI.conclusion: 与若干其他研究不同，本工作不支持该能量区域内存在束缚态或共振态。

title: Downsizing does not extend to dwarf galaxies: identifying the stellar mass regimes shaped by supernova and AGN feedback
comment: Accepted for publication in MNRAS, 14 pages, 7 figures
summary: We explore how the fraction of red (quenched) galaxies varies in the dwarf galaxy regime (10^7 MSun < Mstar < 10^9.5 MSun), using a mass-complete sample of ~5900 dwarfs at z<0.15, constructed using deep multi-wavelength data in the COSMOS field. The red fraction decreases steadily until Mstar ~ 10^8.5 MSun and then increases again towards lower stellar masses. This 'U' shape demonstrates that the traditional notion of 'downsizing' (i.e. that progressively lower mass galaxies maintain star formation until later epochs) is incorrect -- downsizing does not continue uninterrupted into the dwarf regime. The U shape persists regardless of environment, indicating that it is driven by internal processes rather than external environment-driven mechanisms. Our results suggest that, at Mstar < 10^8 MSun, the quenching of star formation is dominated by supernova (SN) feedback and becomes more effective with decreasing stellar mass, as the potential well becomes shallower. At Mstar > 10^9 MSun, the quenching is driven by a mix of SN feedback and AGN feedback (which becomes more effective with increasing stellar mass, as central black holes become more massive). The processes that quench star formation are least effective in the range 10^8 MSun < Mstar < 10^9 MSun, likely because the potential well is deep enough to weaken the impact of SN feedback, while the effect of AGN feedback is still insignificant. The cosmological simulations tested here do not match the details of how the red fraction varies as a function of stellar mass -- we propose that the red fraction vs stellar mass relation (particularly in the dwarf regime) is a powerful calibrator for the processes that regulate star formation in galaxy formation models.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了矮星系（10^7–10^9.5 M⊙）中红色（熄火）星系比例随恒星质量的变化，发现其呈‘U’型分布，挑战了传统‘向下形成’（downsizing）模型，并指出矮星系中Ia型超新星反馈主导熄火，而大质量星系中AGN反馈作用增强；该U型关系可作为星系形成模拟的重要校准依据。
AI.motivation: 检验传统‘向下形成’模型在矮星系区是否成立，并探究矮星系中恒星形成熄火的主导物理机制。
AI.method: 基于COSMOS场深多波段数据构建z<0.15、质量完备的约5900个矮星系样本，统计不同恒星质量区间内红（熄火）星系分数，并结合环境分析与理论机制推断（SN/AGN反馈），对比现有宇宙学模拟结果。
AI.result: 红星系分数在Mstar ~ 10^8.5 M⊙处达最低，整体呈‘U’型；该形状与环境无关；Mstar < 10^8 M⊙时SN反馈主导且效率随质量减小而升高；Mstar > 10^9 M⊙时SN+AGN共同主导；中间质量区间（10^8–10^9 M⊙）熄火效率最低；当前宇宙学模拟未能复现该U型特征。
AI.conclusion: 传统向下形成模型不适用于矮星系；矮星系熄火由内部过程（尤其是SN反馈）主导；红分数–恒星质量关系是检验和校准星系形成模型中反馈物理的关键观测约束。

title: NIAC project report: Solar system-scale VLBI to dramatically improve cosmological distance measurements
comment: 59 pages in big-ish font; NASA/NIAC Phase I study
summary:
We investigate the feasibility and scientific potential of the Cosmic Positioning System (CPS), a space mission concept enabling purely geometric distance measurements to sources at hundreds of megaparsecs by directly detecting electromagnetic wavefront curvature. CPS consists of a constellation of radio antennas distributed across the outer Solar System, operating on baselines of tens of astronomical units. By precisely timing the arrival of repeating fast radio bursts (FRBs), CPS infers source distances via trilateration -- analogous to global navigation satellite systems such as GPS but on cosmological scales.
  We show that CPS distance measurements could result in sub-percent constraints on the Hubble constant with even a handful of detections, whereas we predict that 10-100 FRB sources are likely visible. We evaluate dominant sources of uncertainty -- wavefront timing precision, interstellar refractive delays, spacecraft positional knowledge, and onboard clock stability -- finding these controllable at required levels using near-term technologies. Our nominal design employs five spacecraft with 8 m deployable antennas, 3-6 GHz receivers with sub-30 K system temperatures, and space-qualified atomic clocks similar to those on GPS satellites, supported by a ground network for ranging calibration and FRB alerts.
  Beyond cosmic expansion, CPS may enable frontier measurements in astrophysics and fundamental physics, including constraints on small-scale dark matter structure, microhertz gravitational waves (bridging pulsar timing arrays and LISA), and the outer Solar System mass distribution. The most significant viability issue concerns FRB properties at several-GHz frequencies; we recommend observational campaigns to characterize repeating FRBs in this band.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为宇宙定位系统（CPS）的新空间任务概念，利用分布在太阳系外围的射电望远镜阵列，通过精确测量重复快速射电暴（FRB）的波前到达时间，实现百兆秒差距尺度上的纯几何距离测量，从而高精度测定哈勃常数，并拓展至暗物质、低频引力波和太阳系质量分布等前沿研究。
AI.motivation: 解决当前宇宙学距离测量中依赖标准烛光或模型假设带来的系统误差问题，发展一种不依赖红移-距离关系、完全基于几何原理的独立测距方法。
AI.method: 设计由5颗航天器组成的太阳系外缘射电阵列（基线达数十天文单位），工作频段3–6 GHz，配备8米可展开天线、低温接收机与高稳原子钟；通过多点精确计时重复FRB信号实现宇宙尺度三边测量（trilateration）。
AI.result: 理论分析表明，仅需少量FRB探测即可实现哈勃常数亚百分比精度约束；预计可观测10–100个重复FRB源；各项关键技术（波前定时、星际折射延迟、航天器定轨、钟稳定度）均可借助近中期技术控制在所需水平。
