title: Area Scaling of Dynamical Degrees of Freedom in Regularised Scalar Field Theory
comment: 44 pages + appendix; code and data available at https://github.com/ScaleOfVarun/area-scaling-dynamical-dofs
summary: How many canonical degrees of freedom does a quantum field theory actually use during its Hamiltonian evolution? For a UV/IR-regularised classical scalar field, we address this question directly at the level of phase-space dynamics by identifying the minimal symplectic dimension required to reproduce a single trajectory by an autonomous Hamiltonian system. Using symplectic model order reduction as a structure-preserving diagnostic, we show that for the free scalar field this minimal dimension is controlled not by the volume-extensive number of discretised field variables, but by the much smaller number of distinct normal-mode frequencies below the ultraviolet cutoff. In flat space, this leads to an area-type scaling with the size of the region, up to slowly varying corrections. On geodesic balls in maximally symmetric curved spaces, positive curvature induces mild super-area growth, while negative curvature suppresses the scaling, with the flat result recovered smoothly in the small-curvature limit. Numerical experiments further indicate that this behaviour persists in weakly interacting $λφ^4$ theory over quasi-integrable time scales. Beyond counting, the reduced dynamics exhibits a distinctive internal structure: it decomposes into independent oscillator blocks, while linear combinations of these blocks generate a larger family of apparent field modes whose Poisson brackets are governed by a projector rather than the identity. This reveals a purely classical and dynamical mechanism by which overlapping degrees of freedom arise, without modifying canonical structures by hand. Our results provide a controlled field-theoretic setting in which area-type scaling and overlap phenomena can be studied prior to quantisation, helping to identify which aspects of such structures--often discussed in holographic contexts--can already arise from classical Hamiltonian dynamics.

AI.tldr: 本文通过辛模型降阶方法研究了量子场论在哈密顿演化中实际使用的正则自由度数量，发现其由低于紫外截断的独立本征模频率数决定，而非离散场变量数，并揭示了面积律标度行为及重叠自由度的经典动力学机制。
AI.motivation: 探究量子场论在哈密顿演化中实际使用的正则自由度数量，理解面积律标度和自由度重叠等现象是否可源于经典动力学而非人为修改正则结构。
AI.method: 采用辛模型降阶（symplectic model order reduction）作为结构保持型诊断工具，在UV/IR正则化的经典标量场相空间中，确定重现单条轨迹所需的最小辛维数。
AI.result: 对自由标量场，最小辛维数由紫外截断以下的独立本征模频率数控制；平直空间中呈面积律标度（含慢变修正），曲率空间中正曲率导致轻微超面积增长、负曲率抑制标度；弱相互作用λφ⁴理论中该行为在准可积时间尺度内仍成立；约化动力学分解为独立谐振子块，其线性组合生成具投影型泊松括号的‘表观场模’。
AI.conclusion: 面积律标度与自由度重叠等常在全息语境中讨论的结构，可在未量子化前由纯经典哈密顿动力学自然产生，为识别其经典起源提供了受控场论框架。

title: Ward-Takahashi Identity in Denominator Regularization at One Loop
summary: Explicit analytic expressions for the electron self-energy and the vertex correction in quantum electrodynamics are derived at one loop using the recently proposed regularization scheme known as denominator regularization, assisted by its correspondence with dimensional regularization to determine the coefficient functions, which are a specific ingredient of this approach. We then show that the regularized amplitudes satisfy the Ward-Takahashi identity, thereby ensuring that gauge symmetry is preserved after regularization.

AI.tldr: 本文使用分母正则化方法推导了量子电动力学中电子自能和顶点修正的一圈显式解析表达式，并验证了其满足Ward-Takahashi恒等式，从而保证了规范对称性。
AI.motivation: 发展并应用分母正则化这一新正则化方案，以在保持规范对称性的前提下计算QED中关键的单圈辐射修正。
AI.method: 采用分母正则化（Denominator Regularization），并借助其与维数正则化（Dimensional Regularization）的对应关系来确定该方案中的系数函数，从而得到电子自能和顶点修正的显式解析表达式。
AI.result: 得到了电子自能和顶点修正的一圈显式解析表达式；证明了这些正则化后的振幅严格满足Ward-Takahashi恒等式。
AI.conclusion: 分母正则化是一种可行且自洽的正则化方法，能在单圈水平上保持QED的规范对称性，为后续高阶计算和推广至其他规范理论提供了基础。

title: More on 5d Wilson Loops in Higher-Rank Theories and Blowup Equations
summary: In this article, we further explore the construction and computation of expectation values for Wilson loops in higher-rank 5d $\mathcal{N} = 1$ gauge theories on $\mathbb{C}_2 \times S_1$, by explicitly computing the Wilson loops via Chern-character insertion and qq-characters, including cases with the exceptional gauge group $G_2$. In particular, we propose a systematic way to write down the general blowup equations for Wilson loops by using the constraints from the one-form symmetry and low-instanton data from the instanton partition function. In addition, for one-instanton contributions in a large family of Wilson loop representations, we observe that they admit a $q_1q_2$-expansion, similar to the Hilbert-series structure of instanton partitions in pure gauge theories.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了在5维N=1超对称规范理论中，通过Chern特征插入和qq-特征计算Wilson圈期望值的方法，并推广至例外群G2；提出了基于一形式对称性和低阶瞬子数据的系统性blowup方程构造方法；发现一类Wilson圈的一阶瞬子贡献具有类似纯规范理论瞬子分拆的q1q2展开结构。
AI.motivation: 深入理解高秩5维N=1规范理论中Wilson圈的构造与计算，尤其是扩展到例外群G2的情形，并建立系统性计算框架。
AI.method: 利用Chern-character插入和qq-characters显式计算Wilson圈；结合一形式对称性约束与低阶瞬子数据推导blowup方程；分析一阶瞬子贡献的q1q2展开结构。
AI.result: 提出了适用于Wilson圈的一般blowup方程构造方法；发现一大类Wilson圈的一阶瞬子贡献具有q1q2展开特性，类比于纯规范理论的Hilbert级数结构。
AI.conclusion: 该工作为5维N=1理论中Wilson圈的精确计算提供了新工具和系统性框架，尤其对含例外群G2的理论具有重要意义，并揭示了瞬子展开中潜在的代数结构。

title: Are carbon deflagration supernovae triggered by dark matter ?
summary: Collisions between stellar remnants and dark matter in the Galactic bulge are frequent, and the kinetic energy of a primordial black hole incident on a white dwarf, if it is all thermalized, will raise the degenerate core's temperature, by at least a degree in the case of a lunar mass black hole. This is an underestimate in two ways: the specific heat is less than 3k/2 per particle, and the incoming object is accelerated by gravitational focusing. Detailed physical models have recently been made of this triggering event. Present observational data are equivocal as to whether the radial distribution of type Ia supernovae in galaxies follows the starlight in the galaxies, or is more concentrated towards the center, as collisional triggering would suggest. But future samples of millions of supernovae from the Rubin telescope will change that.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了银河系核球中恒星残骸与暗物质（特别是原初黑洞）碰撞可能触发Ia型超新星的机制，并指出当前观测数据尚无法明确区分该机制是否成立，但未来鲁宾天文台的大样本观测有望验证这一假说。
AI.motivation: 解释Ia型超新星在星系中的径向分布是否更集中于中心，从而检验碰撞触发机制是否真实存在。
AI.method: 基于物理建模分析原初黑洞撞击白矮星时动能热化导致核心升温的过程，并考虑简并态物质比热容和引力聚焦效应的影响。
AI.result: 即使月球质量级的原初黑洞撞击白矮星，也能使简并核升温至少1度；该升温效应被低估，因未充分计入低比热容和引力加速效应；当前Ia型超新星空间分布观测结果尚不明确。
AI.conclusion: 碰撞触发Ia型超新星是一种可行机制，其可观测预言（即超新星更集中于星系中心）有待鲁宾天文台未来百万级样本验证。

title: Entanglement suppression for $ΩΩ$ scattering
comment: 14 pages, Proceedings of the Southeast Asian Workshop on Nuclear and Hadron Physics (SEA-NHP 2025), 19th-21st August, 2025
summary: We study entanglement suppression in $s$-wave $ΩΩ$ scattering, where each baryon has spin $3/2$. By treating the $S$-matrix as a quantum operator acting on the spin states, we quantify its ability to generate entanglement and identify the conditions on the phase shifts of the spin channels that minimize entanglement generation in the system. In $ΩΩ$ scattering, only antisymmetric spin channels are allowed due to Fermi-Dirac statistics. Applying the entanglement-suppression framework to $ΩΩ$ scattering, we find two solutions for the phase shifts: one leading to a spin SU(4) symmetry and the other to a nonrelativistic conformal symmetry. We show that the solution associated with the nonrelativistic conformal symmetry originates from the specific structure of the Clebsch-Gordan coefficients in the $3/2 \otimes 3/2$ system.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了s波ΩΩ散射中的纠缠抑制现象，通过将S矩阵视为作用于自旋态上的量子算符，量化其产生纠缠的能力，并确定了使系统纠缠生成最小化的自旋通道相移条件。
AI.motivation: 由于费米-狄拉克统计限制，ΩΩ散射中只允许反对称自旋通道，因此需要探究在该约束下如何抑制纠缠生成。
AI.method: 将S矩阵建模为作用于自旋态的量子算符，分析其纠缠生成能力，并结合3/2⊗3/2系统的Clebsch-Gordan系数结构，推导满足纠缠抑制的相移条件。
AI.result: 发现两组相移解：一组对应自旋SU(4)对称性，另一组对应非相对论共形对称性；后者源于3/2⊗3/2系统中Clebsch-Gordan系数的特殊结构。
AI.conclusion: ΩΩ散射中纠缠可被有效抑制，并与特定对称性（SU(4)或非相对论共形）相关联，揭示了多粒子强子系统中对称性与量子纠缠之间的深刻联系。

title: The Deformed Dirac Oscillator in Linear-Fractional Doubly Special Relativity
summary: We study the $(1+1)$-dimensional Dirac oscillator within a class of doubly special relativity (DSR) models generated by linear-fractional (projective) transformations on momentum space that preserve both the invariant speed of light and a high-energy observer-independent scale $\Ep$. Starting from the associated deformed Casimir invariants, we construct the coordinate-space Dirac equations for three inequivalent choices of the deformation vector (time-like, space-like, and light-like). For the time-like and light-like realizations the deformation induces momentum-dependent effective mass operators, which makes the coordinate-space formulation sensitive to operator ordering. To retain locality and obtain solvable second-order equations we adopt a reverted-product ordering prescription. Closed-form relativistic energy spectra and eigenfunctions are obtained in all three geometries, and the standard Dirac-oscillator results are recovered smoothly in the limit $\Ep\to\infty$. Finally, we derive the nonrelativistic expansion of the positive-energy branch and show that the deformation geometry controls the leading rest-energy shift and the renormalization of the oscillator level spacing.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了在双特殊相对论（DSR）框架下的一维狄拉克振子，通过动量空间上的线性分式变换构建了三种不同几何（类时、类空、类光）下的变形狄拉克方程，获得了闭合形式的相对论能谱与本征函数，并分析了非相对论极限下的能级修正。
AI.motivation: 探索双特殊相对论（DSR）对基本量子系统（如狄拉克振子）的影响，特别是如何在保持光速和普朗克能量尺度不变的前提下，引入动量空间变形并导出可解的局域性方程。
AI.method: 基于DSR模型中由线性分式变换生成的变形卡西米尔不变量，构造三类（类时、类空、类光）动量空间变形下的坐标空间狄拉克方程；针对动量依赖有效质量导致的算符序问题，采用逆积排序规则以保证局域性和可解性；求解二阶方程获得能谱与本征函数，并进行非相对论展开。
AI.result: 得到了三种DSR几何下闭合形式的相对论能谱和本征函数；验证了当Ep→∞时标准狄拉克振子结果被平滑恢复；明确了非相对论极限下基态能量偏移与振子能级间距重整化由变形几何决定。
AI.conclusion: DSR变形可通过动量空间几何显著影响狄拉克振子的谱结构，其效应在非相对论极限下体现为可观测的能量修正，表明DSR可能在低能有效理论中留下可检验痕迹。

title: Selecting Post-Starburst Galaxies Based on Star Formation History
summary: Post-StarBurst (PSB) galaxies are galaxies that have undergone a large burst of star formation followed by rapid quenching. Understanding their properties as a population can help us better understand how galaxies evolve to quiescence. This project aims to use Star Formation History (SFH) measurements from the Integral Field Spectroscopy (IFS) surveys MaNGA, CALIFA, and AMUSING++ processed with the Pipe3D analysis pipeline in order to select PSB galaxies as well as PSB regions in galaxies. Most PSB selection methods use cutoffs determined by spectral features, but in this work we introduce a new PSB selection method based directly on the property we are most interested in; inferred SFHs. IFS data allows us to probe a galaxy's star formation on a spatially resolved scale, enabling us to examine the size, shape, and location of PSB regions within a galaxy. We select 107 PSB galaxies, only 7 of which are among known PSBs selected by other methods. Unlike traditional PSB selection methods, our approach is not biased against Active Galactic Nuclei (AGN). Despite this, we still find no evidence for a significant Seyfert 2 PSB population, suggesting that strong AGN activity is uncommon throughout the PSB phase. Our spatially-resolved SFH selection identifies a wide range of galaxies, including globally quiescent elliptical galaxies with centrally-concentrated PSB spaxels, galaxies with ring-like PSB spaxels and a preference for inside-out age gradients (contrary to what has previously been observed in the literature), and galaxies with widespread PSB regions that have significant star formation elsewhere in the galaxy.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于星族合成推断的恒星形成历史（SFH）直接识别后星暴（PSB）星系的新方法，利用MaNGA、CALIFA和AMUSING++等积分视场光谱巡天数据及Pipe3D分析流程，实现了空间分辨的PSB区域识别；共选出107个PSB星系，其中仅7个与传统光谱特征法重合；该方法不受AGN污染影响，但未发现显著的Seyfert 2型PSB星系；揭示了PSB区域在星系中呈现多样空间分布（如核区集中、环状、内外反向年龄梯度等）。
AI.motivation: 理解后星暴（PSB）星系的总体性质有助于揭示星系如何快速演化至宁静态；传统基于光谱特征截断的PSB选择方法存在对AGN的系统性偏差，且无法反映真实的恒星形成历史。
AI.method: 基于IFS巡天（MaNGA、CALIFA、AMUSING++）数据，使用Pipe3D分析流程获取空间分辨的恒星形成历史（SFH），据此直接定义并识别PSB星系及PSB空间像素（spaxel）；与传统光谱特征（如Dn4000、Hδ）截断法对比，并分析PSB区域的空间分布与形态。
AI.result: 选出107个PSB星系，仅7个与已有样本重合；未发现显著Seyfert 2型PSB星系；识别出多种PSB空间构型：核区集中型、环状分布型（伴随内-外年龄梯度反转）、以及广泛分布但其余区域仍有显著恒星形成的混合型。
AI.conclusion: 基于SFH的PSB识别方法更本质、无AGN选择偏差，能揭示更丰富多样的PSB物理图像；PSB并非单一演化路径，其空间分布多样性表明星系淬灭过程具有复杂的时序与几何特征。

title: Constraints on invisible $B^{+}\to K^{+} X$ decays from the Belle II $B^{+} \to K^{+} ν\barν$ measurement
summary: Belle II measurement of the branching fraction for $B^{+} \to K^{+} ν\barν$ shows a $2.7σ$ excess over the Standard Model prediction and motivates new-physics explanations such as axion-like particles, Higgs-like scalars, or beyond Standard Model gauge bosons. A two-body decay \BKX with an invisible $X$ provides a natural candidate explanation. This work provides a comprehensive test of this hypothesis using Belle II's public model-agnostic likelihood. Posterior distributions are derived for the resonance mass $m_X$ and the branching fraction, and a modified frequentist upper-limit mass scan is performed. The data favor a resonance with mass $m_X = 2.1^{+0.2}_{-0.1}$ GeV and the product $\mathcal{B}(B^+\to K^+ X) \cdot \mathcal{P}_{X,\rm inv} = 9.2^{+1.8}_{-3.4} \cdot 10^{-6}$, where $\mathcal{P}_{X,\rm inv}$ is the probability that $X$ (and its decay products) are undetected. Bayes factors indicate a very strong preference for the Standard Model plus resonance over the Standard Model-only hypothesis. A frequentist likelihood-ratio test favors the Standard Model plus resonance hypothesis by $3.0σ$. A light invisible resonance plus the Standard Model therefore provides a compelling description of the Belle II data.

AI.tldr: 本文通过Belle II实验数据，检验了B+→K+X（X为不可见粒子）这一新物理假说，发现质量约为2.1 GeV的轻不可见共振态能很好解释观测到的2.7σ超出，贝叶斯与频率统计分析均显著支持该模型。
AI.motivation: Belle II在B+→K+νν̄衰变中观测到2.7σ超出标准模型预期，亟需新物理机制解释，如类轴子、类希格斯标量或超出标准模型的规范玻色子；两体衰变B+→K+X（X不可见）是自然候选解释。
AI.method: 利用Belle II公开的模型无关似然函数，进行贝叶斯分析得到共振质量m_X和分支比的后验分布，并开展修正的频率统计方法质量扫描以获取上限。
AI.result: 数据分析偏好共振质量m_X = 2.1^{+0.2}_{-0.1} GeV，对应乘积分支比ℬ(B+→K+X)·𝒫_{X,inv} = 9.2^{+1.8}_{-3.4}×10^{-6}；贝叶斯因子强烈支持‘标准模型+共振’假说；似然比检验给出3.0σ置信度支持该假说。
AI.conclusion: 轻不可见共振态叠加标准模型可有力解释Belle II观测结果，为新物理提供了有希望的候选方案。

title: Split Representations and Bubble Resummation for Massive de Sitter Correlators
summary: We combine spectral- and split representations to factorize multi-loop momentum space diagrams, in the Schwinger-Keldysh formulation for cosmological correlators, with massive scalars in the loop. This allows us to extend the resummation of loop contributions from flat to de Sitter space. Furthermore, in our split representation the signal part of the correlators can be identified directly on the integrand level from the spectral function. We apply this to describe the non-perturbative flow of the EFT background and the cosmological collider signals in a large-N model.

AI.tldr: 本文结合谱表示和分裂表示，对宇宙学关联子中的多圈动量空间图进行分解，从而将环图贡献的重求和从平直时空推广到德西特时空，并在被积函数层面直接识别信号部分，应用于大N模型中EFT背景的非微扰演化和宇宙学对撞机信号的研究。
AI.motivation: 将环图重求和方法从平直时空推广到德西特时空，并在被积函数层面直接识别宇宙学关联子中的信号成分。
AI.method: 结合谱表示（spectral representation）与分裂表示（split representation），在Schwinger-Keldysh形式下处理含质量标量粒子的多圈宇宙学关联子。
AI.result: 实现了德西特空间中多圈贡献的有效重求和；在分裂表示下可直接从谱函数识别关联子的信号部分；成功应用于大N模型中EFT背景的非微扰流和宇宙学对撞机信号分析。
AI.conclusion: 该方法为研究弯曲时空（特别是德西特空间）中非微扰宇宙学效应提供了新工具，增强了对早期宇宙高能物理信号的解析能力。

title: A Monopolar Jet from Protostar HOPS 10: Evidence for Asymmetric Magnetized Launching
comment: Accepted for publication in the Astronomical Journal
summary: A fundamental challenge in star formation is understanding how a protostar accretes mass from its circumstellar disk while removing excess angular momentum. Protostellar jets are widely invoked as the primary channels for angular momentum removal, yet the mechanism by which they are launched and extract angular momentum remains poorly constrained. Here we report high-resolution ALMA Band 7 (345 GHz) and Band 6 (230 GHz) observations of CO (3-2), CO (2-1), and SiO (5-4) emission from the protostar HOPS 10 (G209.55-19.68S2). The combined data trace both the entrained outflow and the collimated jet with excellent spatial and velocity resolution, revealing a uniquely monopolar protostellar jet, the clearest example reported to date. The system exhibits a distinctly unipolar high-velocity jet with velocity offsets of +44 to +66 km s-1, unlike the predominantly bipolar morphology characteristic of most protostellar jets. While the low-velocity outflow, with velocity offsets of -20 to +30 km s-1, is detected in both directions, the high-velocity jet appears only on one side, and this monopolarity is consistent across all tracers. Given the nearly edge-on geometry and low submillimeter extinction, comparable emission would normally be expected from both lobes. The shock tracer SiO emission confirms a genuine, highly collimated jet rather than cloud contamination, and no ambient structure is capable of obscuring a counterjet. We argue that intrinsically asymmetric mass loading along the disk magnetic field lines provides the most plausible explanation for the observed monopolarity.

AI.tldr: 本文利用ALMA高分辨率观测揭示了原恒星HOPS 10存在迄今最清晰的单极喷流，挑战了典型双极喷流模型，并提出盘磁力线上的非对称物质加载是其成因。
AI.motivation: 理解原恒星如何从周围盘吸积质量并移除多余角动量是恒星形成的核心问题；虽然喷流被广泛认为是角动量移除的主要通道，但其启动机制和角动量提取过程仍缺乏约束。
AI.method: 使用ALMA Band 7（345 GHz）和Band 6（230 GHz）对HOPS 10进行高空间与速度分辨率观测，分析CO（3-2）、CO（2-1）和SiO（5-4）谱线发射，区分外流与准直喷流结构。
AI.result: 发现HOPS 10具有迄今最清晰的单极高速喷流（速度偏移+44至+66 km/s），而低速外流呈双极；该单极性在所有分子示踪剂中一致，且SiO确认其为真实、高度准直的喷流，排除视线方向遮挡或云团污染可能。
AI.conclusion: 喷流单极性最可能源于吸积盘磁力线上的本征非对称物质加载，而非观测效应，这对喷流驱动与角动量传输理论提出了新约束。

title: The S-wave topped meson
summary: Inspired by the recent observation of the near-threshold enhancement in top-quark pair production by CMS and ATLAS, we investigate the mass spectrum of S-wave topped meson which containing a single top quark, i.e., $t\bar{q}$, $t\bar{c}$, and $t\bar{b}$, in the framework of Bethe-Salpeter formalism. These states are expected to exhibit significantly enhanced lifetimes and correspondingly narrower decay widths compared to toponium, primarily because only a single top quark participates in the weak decay process. The numerical results indicate that the masses of topped mesons are close to the top-quark mass. For the $t\bar{b}$ states, the $1S$ state is approximately 5.08~GeV heavier than the top quark, while the $2S$, $3S$, and $4S$ states are about 5.37~GeV, 5.57~GeV, and 5.74~GeV heavier, respectively. For the $t\bar{c}$ states, the corresponding mass differences are 1.90~GeV, 2.23~GeV, 2.45~GeV, and 2.60~GeV. The possible production and decay properties are also analyzed, which could be measured in LHC experiments.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了包含单个顶夸克的S波 topped 介子（如 $t\bar{q}$、$t\bar{c}$、$t\bar{b}$）的质量谱，基于Bethe-Salpeter方法，发现其质量接近顶夸克质量，寿命更长、衰变宽度更窄，并预测了各能级质量差及LHC可观测性。
AI.motivation: 受CMS和ATLAS在顶夸克对产生阈值附近观测到增强现象的启发，探索含单顶夸克的新型强子态——topped 介子的性质。
AI.method: 采用Bethe-Salpeter方程框架计算S波 $t\bar{q}$、$t\bar{c}$、$t\bar{b}$ 介子的质量谱，并分析其寿命、衰变宽度及产生与衰变特性。
AI.result: 数值结果表明：$t\bar{b}$ 的1S–4S态比顶夸克质量分别重约5.08、5.37、5.57、5.74 GeV；$t\bar{c}$ 对应为1.90、2.23、2.45、2.60 GeV；这些态因仅一个顶夸克参与弱衰变而具有更长寿命和更窄宽度。
AI.conclusion: topped 介子是理论上可行且LHC上潜在可探测的新强子态，其质量谱和衰变特性为理解顶夸克强相互作用及寻找新强子提供了新方向。

title: A deep MeerKAT view of associated HI absorption in radio AGNs at intermediate redshift: Role of absorber geometry and conditions of the gas
comment: 14 pages, Accepted for publication in Astronomy & Astrophysics
summary: We present MeerKAT observations searching for HI absorption in a sample of 17 powerful ($L_{\rm 1.4GHz}> 10^{27}$ W Hz$^{-1}$) radio sources at intermediate redshifts ($0.25<z<0.7$). The sample is well characterised at radio and optical wavelengths, allowing us to connect the presence (or absence) of HI to the properties of the AGN and its host galaxy. The sample consists mostly of core-dominated sources and quasars. Half of the targets have a UV luminosity $L_{\rm UV} = 10^{23}$ W Hz$^{-1}$, above this limit, the gas would be expected to be ionised by this radiation. We obtained 15 spectra free (or almost free) of radio frequency interference, reaching extremely low optical depths ($τ_{\rm peak} < 0.005$) resulting in three new HI absorption detections. Two are associated HI absorptions, giving a detection rate of such systems of $13\%\pm 7\%$. Both are found in young radio sources (PKS 1151-34 and PKS 1306-09), confirming the trend that this type of sources are more often detected in HI compared to more evolved ones. The UV luminosity of both these sources is below $10^{23}$ W Hz$^{-1}$. Surprisingly, one of the detections (PKS 1151-34) is hosted by a quasar, suggesting that the radio lobes are still embedded in the circumnuclear disc. In the second source (PKS 1306-09), the HI is highly blueshifted and likely part of a jet-driven outflow. A third detection is a 'local intervening' system, caused by a galaxy in the local environment of PKS 0405-12 and located in front of the southern radio lobe of this source, about 100 kpc in projection from this quasar. Overall, the results indicate a variety of plausible situations, which resemble what is seen at low redshifts. For the associated absorption, a combination of evolutionary status of the radio sources, physical conditions, and geometry of the gas structure determine the detection rate of HI absorption.

AI.tldr: 本文利用MeerKAT望远镜对17个中红移（0.25<z<0.7）、高射电光度（L₁.₄GHz > 10²⁷ W Hz⁻¹）的射电源开展中性氢（HI）吸收观测，共获得15条高质量谱线，探测到3例HI吸收：2例为与源相关的吸收（探测率13%±7%），均出现在年轻射电源中且紫外光度低于电离阈值；1例为本地前景星系引起的干涉吸收。结果表明HI吸收探测率受射电源演化阶段、气体物理条件及几何结构共同影响。
AI.motivation: 探究中红移强射电源中中性氢（HI）吸收的存在性及其与AGN和宿主星系性质（如射电源类型、紫外辐射强度、演化阶段）的关联，以理解气体在活动星系核环境中的分布、电离状态及动力学行为。
AI.method: 利用MeerKAT射电望远镜对17个中间红移（0.25<z<0.7）、高射电光度（L₁.₄GHz > 10²⁷ W Hz⁻¹）的射电源进行HI 21cm吸收线观测；结合已有光学与射电数据，分析HI吸收的探测率、红移特征、宿主性质（如是否为类星体、UV光度、射电源年龄）及可能的物理起源（如盘气体、外流、前景星系）。
AI.result: 在15条低干扰谱线中探测到3例HI吸收：2例为‘相关吸收’（PKS 1151-34和PKS 1306-09），均属年轻射电源且UV光度<10²³ W Hz⁻¹；其中PKS 1151-34为类星体，暗示射电瓣仍嵌于核周盘中；PKS 1306-09的HI显著蓝移，可能源于喷流驱动外流；第3例（PKS 0405-12）为‘本地前景’吸收，来自投影距离约100 kpc的邻近星系。总体相关HI吸收探测率为13%±7%。
AI.conclusion: 中红移强射电源的HI相关吸收探测率较低（~13%），主要受限于射电源演化阶段（年轻源更易探测）、紫外辐射电离效应（L_UV < 10²³ W Hz⁻¹更利于中性氢存留）及气体几何结构；观测揭示了HI在AGN环境中的多样物理场景（核盘、外流、前景星系），与低红移结果一致，支持HI吸收是研究AGN反馈与气体演化的重要探针。

title: $S-P-D$ Mixing in Vector Quarkonia from the Salpeter Equation with Optimized Wave Function Representations
summary: This paper proposes a novel mechanism based on the instantaneous Bethe-Salpeter (Salpeter) equation for investigating wave function mixing in vector mesons such as $ψ(3770)$. Conventional theories typically treat $ψ(3770)$ as a $2S-1D$ mixed state; however, considering only tensor forces or relativistic corrections alone often leads to mixing angles that are too small and inconsistent with experimental data. Phenomenological $2S-1D$ mixing requires experimental data as input to determine the mixing angles, resulting in limited theoretical studies on states like $Υ(1D, 2D)$ in the absence of experimental data. To more accurately describe $S-D$ mixing and its relativistic effects, this paper systematically compares eight possible relativistic wave function representations ($\varphi_1$ to $\varphi_8$) by solving the Salpeter equation and calculates the mass spectra and dileptonic decay widths of charmonium and bottomonium. The study finds that the wave function representation $\varphi_2$ can simultaneously reproduce the experimental data of both charmonium and bottomonium well. Further analysis reveals that, in addition to $S-D$ mixing, the wave functions of vector mesons contain a non-negligible $P$-wave component, meaning they are $S-P-D$ mixed states. We predict the mixing angles for bottomonium $Υ(1D)$ and $Υ(2D)$ to be $(1.78^{+0.32}_{-0.25})^\circ$ and $(5.44^{+1.10}_{-0.76})^\circ$, with dileptonic decay widths of $2.29^{+0.86}_{-0.69}$ eV and $10.5^{+4.2}_{-3.1}$ eV, respectively.

AI.tldr: 本文提出基于瞬时Bethe-Salpeter方程的新机制，系统比较八种相对论波函数表示，发现φ₂能同时较好复现实验数据，并指出矢量介子波函数实为S-P-D混合态，预测了Υ(1D)和Υ(2D)的混合角与双轻子衰变宽度。
AI.motivation: 传统理论仅考虑张量力或相对论修正导致S-D混合角偏小、与实验不符；唯象混合依赖实验输入，难以推广至尚无实验数据的底偶素态（如Υ(1D, 2D)）。
AI.method: 求解瞬时Bethe-Salpeter方程，系统比较八种相对论波函数表示（φ₁–φ₈），计算粲偶素与底偶素的质量谱及双轻子衰变宽度。
AI.result: φ₂波函数表示可同时较好复现粲偶素与底偶素实验数据；发现矢量介子波函数含不可忽略P波成分，即为S-P-D混合态；预测Υ(1D)和Υ(2D)混合角分别为(1.78⁺⁰·³²_−₀·₂₅)°和(5.44⁺¹·¹⁰_−₀·₇₆)°，双轻子衰变宽度分别为2.29⁺⁰·⁸⁶_−₀·₆₉ eV和10.5⁺⁴·²_−₃·₁ eV。
AI.conclusion: S-P-D混合是更准确描述矢量介子结构的关键，φ₂波函数表示具有普适性，所提方法可有效预测缺乏实验数据的高激发态性质。

title: Herschel/HIFI Observations of Molecular Lines Toward G10.47+0.03
comment: 22 pages and 7 figures. Accepted for publication in the Frontiers in Astronomy and Space Sciences
summary: We present a spectral line analysis of the hot molecular core G10.47+0.03 (hereafter, G10). Our aim is to determine molecular abundances and excitation conditions across a wide spectral range inaccessible to ground-based observatories. We utilize archival data from the Herschel Space Observatory, obtained with the Heterodyne Instrument for the Far-Infrared (HIFI). We report here the detection of high-excitation CO, 13CO, and C18O, H2O isotopologues, HCO+, HCN, HNC, CS, C34S, SO, SO2, H2CS, and CH3OH. CO, p-H2O, CS, and HCN show similar velocity profiles with a narrow, blueshifted component, which may be linked to the outer outflow layer. Redshifted wings may indicate inner outflow activity. A Markov Chain Monte Carlo framework is employed to infer column densities and temperatures accurately. We also performed spectral energy distribution fitting to constrain the global physical parameters of G10, providing essential context for interpreting the molecular emission. The MCMC analysis revealed two excitation temperature components: a warm component (30-65 K) and a hot component (90-250 K). The higher temperatures indicate dense, hot gas typical of massive hot cores. The lower temperatures correspond to the warm, less dense envelope around the core. Transitions of H2O, high-excitation CO, and HCN indicate outflowing gas and high-density shocked regions. These findings highlight G10's complex dynamical environment.

AI.tldr: 本文利用赫歇尔空间天文台的HIFI数据，对热分子核G10.47+0.03进行了谱线分析，探测到多种分子，并通过MCMC方法推断出双温度组分（30–65 K和90–250 K），揭示其复杂动力学环境及外流与激波区域特征。
AI.motivation: 旨在利用地面望远镜无法覆盖的远红外波段，测定G10热分子核的分子丰度和激发条件。
AI.method: 基于赫歇尔/HIFI归档数据，开展谱线分析；采用马尔可夫链蒙特卡洛（MCMC）方法反演柱密度和激发温度；结合能谱分布（SED）拟合约束整体物理参数。
AI.result: 探测到CO、13CO、C18O、H2O同位素、HCO+、HCN、HNC、CS、C34S、SO、SO2、H2CS、CH3OH等多种分子；发现CO、p-H2O、CS、HCN具有相似蓝移窄成分，可能对应外流外层；识别出双温度激发组分（30–65 K 和 90–250 K）；H2O、高激发CO和HCN谱线指示外流与高密度激波区。
AI.conclusion: G10是一个具有复杂动力学结构的热分子核，包含致密高温核心与较温暖稀薄包层，且存在显著外流与激波活动。

title: Elliptic Multiple Polylogarithms with Arbitrary Arguments in \textsc{GiNaC}
comment: 29 pages, 3 figures, discussed code to be released in GiNaC
summary: We present an algorithm for the numerical evaluation of elliptic multiple polylogarithms for arbitrary arguments and to arbitrary precision. The cornerstone of our approach is a procedure to obtain a convergent $q$-series representation of elliptic multiple polylogarithms. Its coefficients are expressed in terms of ordinary multiple polylogarithms, which can be evaluated efficiently using existing libraries. In a series of preparation steps the elliptic polylogarithms are mapped into a region where the $q$-series converges rapidly. We also present an implementation of our algorithm into the \texttt{GiNaC} framework. This release constitutes the first public package capable of evaluating elliptic multiple polylogarithms to high precision and for arbitrary values of the arguments.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种用于任意参数和任意精度数值计算椭圆多重对数函数的算法，核心是通过转化为快速收敛的q-级数表示，并利用已有库高效计算其系数（普通多重对数函数），并实现了基于GiNaC框架的首个公开高精度通用计算工具。
AI.motivation: 缺乏能对任意参数和高精度计算椭圆多重对数函数的公开工具。
AI.method: 构造收敛的q-级数表示，系数由普通多重对数函数表达；通过预处理将函数映射至q-级数快速收敛区域；在GiNaC框架中实现该算法。
AI.result: 实现了首个可公开获取、支持高精度与任意参数的椭圆多重对数函数计算软件包。
AI.conclusion: 所提算法有效解决了椭圆多重对数函数的通用高精度数值计算问题，具备实用性和先进性。

title: Organic Acid Chemistry in ISM: Detection of Formic Acid and its Prebiotic Chemistry in Hot Core G358.93$-$0.03 MM1
comment: Published in Research in Astronomy and Astrophysics (RAA)
summary: In the interstellar medium, formic acid (HCOOH) plays a significant role in the synthesis of the simplest amino acid, glycine (NH$_{2}$CH$_{2}$COOH). The presence of HCOOH suggests that oxygen-bearing molecules may be directly involved in the chemical and physical evolution of star formation regions, particularly in hot molecular cores. This paper presents the first detection of the rotational emission lines of the $trans$-conformer of HCOOH toward the hot molecular core G358.93$-$0.03 MM1, located in the massive star formation region G358.93$-$0.03. This study employed high-resolution observations from the Atacama Large Millimeter/submillimeter Array (ALMA) in Band 7. The column density and excitation temperature of $t$-HCOOH are determined as $(8.13\pm0.72)\times10^{15}$ cm$^{-2}$ and $120\pm15$ K, respectively. The fractional abundance of $t$-HCOOH relative to H$_{2}$ is $(2.62\pm 0.29)\times 10^{-9}$. The column density ratios of $t$-HCOOH/CH$_{3}$OH and $t$-HCOOH/H$_{2}$CO are $(1.56 \pm 0.12)\times 10^{-2}$ and $(1.16 \pm 0.12)$, respectively. We computed a three-phase warm-up chemical model of HCOOH using the gas-grain chemical code UCLCHEM. We found that the observed and modelled abundances of HCOOH are almost identical, within a factor of 0.89. Based on chemical modelling, we showed that HCOOH may be formed through the reaction between HCO and OH on the grain surface, which is further released in the gas-phase.

AI.tldr: 本文首次在热分子核G358.93−0.03 MM1中探测到反式甲酸（t-HCOOH）的旋转发射线，并通过ALMA高分辨率观测确定其柱密度、激发温度和相对丰度；结合UCLCHEM三相温升化学模型，表明t-HCOOH主要通过尘埃表面HCO与OH反应生成并释放至气相。
AI.motivation: 甲酸（HCOOH）是星际介质中合成甘氨酸等有机分子的关键前驱体，其存在暗示含氧分子在恒星形成区（尤其是热核）的化学演化中起重要作用；但此前尚未在热核中明确探测到其反式构型（t-HCOOH），亟需观测确认并探究其形成机制。
AI.method: 利用ALMA Band 7对热分子核G358.93−0.03 MM1进行高分辨率毫米/亚毫米波观测，识别t-HCOOH旋转谱线；通过谱线拟合获得柱密度、激发温度及丰度比；构建基于UCLCHEM的三相（气相、冰幔、尘埃表面）温升化学模型，模拟HCOOH的形成与释放过程。
AI.result: 首次在G358.93−0.03 MM1中探测到t-HCOOH；测得其柱密度为(8.13±0.72)×10¹⁵ cm⁻²、激发温度为120±15 K、相对于H₂的丰度为(2.62±0.29)×10⁻⁹；模型丰度与观测值在0.89倍内一致；支持HCO+OH在尘埃表面反应为主要形成路径。
AI.conclusion: t-HCOOH在热核中的存在被确证，其丰度与化学模型高度吻合，证实表面反应HCO+OH是其主导形成机制，强化了含氧有机分子在恒星形成早期化学演化中的关键作用。

title: Minimal Freeze-in Dark Matter: Reviving electroweak doublet dark matter with Boltzmann suppressed freeze-in
summary: Dark matter communicating with the Standard Model solely via electroweak interactions provides a compelling picture. However, thermal freeze-out of electroweak doublet dark matter is generically strongly excluded by direct detection. We show that SU(2)${}_L$ doublet fermion dark matter evades direct detection if its mass exceeds $10^{10}$ GeV. If the neutral Dirac fermion is split into a pseudo-Dirac pair (via high dimension operator) this limit can be relaxed to 300 GeV. Provided the dark matter mass is above the reheat temperature of the Universe, the production rate never exceeds the Hubble rate in cases of interest, thus the dark matter never thermalizes. We apply constraints from direct detection (e.g. LZ) and consider the discovery potential of Darwin. This scenario presents the most minimal model of freeze-in dark matter, and is both elegant and highly predictive.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种仅通过弱相互作用与标准模型耦合的暗物质模型，指出当SU(2)_L二重态费米子暗物质质量超过10^10 GeV（或在伪狄拉克分裂下低至300 GeV）时可避开当前直接探测限制，并以非热冻结产生（freeze-in）机制实现，是最小且高度可预测的模型。
AI.motivation: 解决电弱二重态暗物质在传统热冻结机制下被直接探测实验（如LZ）强烈排除的问题，探索其在非热历史下的可行性。
AI.method: 分析高能SU(2)_L双态费米子暗物质的直接探测截面、热历史（是否热化）、冻结产生机制，并结合LZ与Darwin实验灵敏度施加约束。
AI.result: 发现质量>10^10 GeV的中性狄拉克双态暗物质可完全避开当前直接探测；若引入高维算符导致伪狄拉克分裂，质量下限可降至约300 GeV；该暗物质从未热化，属典型的freeze-in产生。
AI.conclusion: 该模型是迄今最简的电弱级freeze-in暗物质框架，兼具理论简洁性与实验可检验性，为未来Darwin等实验提供了明确探测目标。

title: Cosmological signature and light Dark Matter in Dirac $L_μ-L_τ$ model
summary: We revisit an anomaly-free extension of the Standard Model (SM) $viz.$ gauged ${L_μ-L_τ}$ model in the Dirac framework, where the local $U(1)_{L_μ-L_τ}$ symmetry breaks and gives rise to a new gauge boson $Z'$ and corresponding gauge coupling $g_{μτ}$. Three additional heavy vector-like fermions, three light right-handed neutrinos and two heavy singlet scalars are added to complete the model framework for Dirac neutrinos. Another singlet vector-like fermion is added with a new gauge charge, which serves as a viable DM candidate, and the correct relic abundance is obtained via the resonance effect. The parameter space is considered after satisfying the current bounds on $M_{Z'}$ and the gauge coupling $g_{μτ}$. The influence of dark radiations coming from the additional light degrees of freedoms are studied in connection with the dark matter. After imposing all relevant theoretical and experimental constraints, the allowed parameter space is found to be highly restricted yet still accessible to ongoing and near-future experiments, rendering the scenario strongly predictive. Moreover, clear correlations among the relevant observables emerge throughout this study, making the model testable in current and future experimental searches.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了标准模型的一个无反常扩展——带电荷U(1)_{L_μ-L_τ}的Dirac中微子模型，引入Z'玻色子、矢量样费米子、右手中微子和标量粒子，并提出一种带新规范荷的单态矢量样费米子作为暗物质候选者，通过共振机制实现正确剩余丰度；在满足各类理论与实验约束后，参数空间被高度限制但仍可被当前及未来实验检验。
AI.motivation: 解决标准模型无法解释中微子质量与暗物质本质的问题，同时保持理论自洽（无反常）并兼容现有实验限制（如Z'质量与耦合强度）。
AI.method: 构建一个包含U(1)_{L_μ-L_τ}规范对称性破缺、Dirac中微子质量机制、多个矢量样费米子、右手中微子及两个重单态标量的扩展模型；将其中一个额外单态矢量样费米子设为暗物质候选者，通过共振湮灭机制计算其热退耦丰度；系统分析理论自洽性（如幺正性、扰动性）与实验约束（如B物理、中微子散射、宇宙学Neff、直接/间接探测等）。
AI.result: 在满足所有当前实验与理论限制下，模型参数空间被显著压缩但仍存在可观测区域；发现Z'质量、耦合强度、暗物质质量及暗辐射贡献之间存在清晰关联；暗物质丰度可通过Z'共振区精确实现；模型预言可在LHC、Belle II、SHiP、DARKSIDE等实验中被检验。
AI.conclusion: 该U(1)_{L_μ-L_τ} Dirac中微子+矢量样暗物质模型是自洽、高度预测性且实验可检验的框架，在解释中微子质量起源与暗物质本质方面具有重要价值。

title: EMU Radio Observations of Barred Spiral Galaxy NGC 5938 (Araish)
comment: This Paper has been accepted for publication in PASA. It contains 12 Pages, 7 figures, and 2 Tables
summary: We present multi-wavelength observations of the nearby spiral galaxy NGC 5938 (Araish) to investigate the origin of its radio emission, specifically the contribution from active galactic nucleus (AGN) activity and star formation. Using Evolutionary Map of the Universe (EMU) data, we detect extended radio emission extending outwards to the galactic axis, with a steep non-thermal spectral index ($α= -1.2 \pm 0.2$) indicative of synchrotron radiation from an AGN jet. The jet has a physical extent of $\approx 8.2\,kpc$ (angular length of $64^{\prime\prime}$). Multi-wavelength data from The Dark Energy Camera Plane Survey 2 (DECaPS2), Wide-field Infrared Survey Explorer (WISE), and extended Roentgen Survey with an Imaging Telescope Array (eROSITA) provide further support for this interpretation. The colour-colour diagram presenting WISE infrared observations suggests the presence of dust and young stars that trace the galaxy's disk structure. Our analysis reveals a radio jet, alongside star formation traced by infrared emission, demonstrating the complex interplay of AGN activity and star formation in this well-resolved galaxy. Intriguingly, the spatial relationship reveals the brighter X-ray emission to be largely adjacent to and enveloping the extended radio emission. This suggests that the radio jet, while extending at a significant angle to the galactic disk, is confined by the larger X-ray gas halo, similar to other systems (i.e., ESO 295-IG022, Centaurus A) and may indicate jet collimation and channelling effects.

AI.tldr: 本文通过多波段观测研究了邻近旋涡星系NGC 5938的射电辐射起源，确认其存在约8.2 kpc长的AGN喷流，并发现X射线气体晕对其具有约束作用，揭示了AGN活动与恒星形成在该星系中的复杂共存关系。
AI.motivation: 探究邻近旋涡星系NGC 5938射电辐射的起源，特别是活动星系核（AGN）活动与恒星形成各自贡献的程度。
AI.method: 结合EMU射电数据、DECaPS2光学、WISE红外及eROSITA X射线多波段观测，分析射电谱指数、空间结构与多波段色-色图，识别AGN喷流与恒星形成特征，并探讨其空间关联性。
AI.result: 探测到物理尺度约8.2 kpc、谱指数α = −1.2 ± 0.2的延展非热射电喷流；WISE显示尘埃与年轻恒星分布于星系盘；eROSITA显示较强X射线辐射包裹并邻近射电喷流，暗示X射线气体晕对喷流具有约束和准直作用。
AI.conclusion: NGC 5938中同时存在显著AGN喷流与恒星形成活动，且喷流被大尺度X射线气体晕所限制，表明AGN反馈可能受宿主星系热气体环境调制，支持喷流-介质相互作用的普遍物理图像。

title: The Too Visible QCD Axion
summary: Murayama proposed a GeV-scale axion theory where the up-quark mass term is generated dynamically by the QCD chiral condensate, spontaneously breaking a Peccei-Quinn symmetry. It predicts a too large mass splitting between neutral and charged pions. Trying to solve this problem we explore extensions. Despite some partial improvements, we identify a structural obstruction: the new Peccei-Quinn spurion breaks the accidental isospin symmetry of the chiral Lagrangian, leading to an enhanced higher-order operator. As a consequence, pion scatterings too are distorted. We also examine the limit in which the axion becomes light, finding that it is excluded by fifth-force constraints.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了Murayama提出的GeV尺度轴子理论中因上夸克质量项动力学生成所导致的中性与带电π介子质量分裂过大问题，发现其根源在于新的Peccei-Quinn破缺源破坏手征拉格朗日量中的偶然同位旋对称性，从而诱导出增强的高阶算符，进一步扭曲π介子散射；同时轻轴子极限被第五力实验排除。
AI.motivation: 解决Murayama GeV轴子模型中由QCD手征凝聚动态生成上夸克质量所引发的中性与带电π介子质量分裂过大的问题。
AI.method: 分析Peccei-Quinn对称性破缺引入的新spurion对手征拉格朗日量中同位旋对称性的影响，并考察其在π介子质量差和散射过程中的低能表现；同时研究轴子变轻极限下的第五力实验约束。
AI.result: 发现新Peccei-Quinn spurion必然破坏偶然同位旋对称性，导致不可忽略的高阶算符贡献，使π介子质量分裂及散射均被显著扭曲；轻轴子极限被现有第五力实验严格排除。
AI.conclusion: 该GeV轴子模型存在结构性障碍，难以自洽地同时满足强子物理与第五力实验约束，需更根本的机制修正。

title: Global statistical entropy and its implications for the main sequences of stars and galaxies
comment: 8 pages, 3 figures, accepted for publication in Astronomy & Astrophysics
summary: In a dissipative system such as star or a galaxy, the emitted photons are decoupled from matter particles and may therefore be considered as part of a closed system to which the Second Law of Thermodynamics applies. In the present paper, we define a global entropy using a statistical approach that accounts for the contributions of both matter particles and photons. The statistical contribution of radiation is described as a photon gas in the definition of this global entropy. The increase in global entropy can foster structure formation -- rather than disorder -- because structures such as stars and galaxies are efficient at dissipating energy in the form of photons, and thus at producing entropy. We show that stars generate a nearly equal amount of specific entropy, and therefore a comparable number of photons per unit mass, over their lifetime on the main sequence of the Hertzsprung-Russell (HR) diagram. This suggests that the main sequence of the HR diagram constitutes a locus of convergence toward a universal specific entropy production by stars. We then examine the implications of this approach for the star-formation main sequence in galaxies, and find a similar result. The emergence of organized structures in cosmic history reflects the second law, as organized matter is efficient at generating entropy through the slicing of energy into lower-frequency photons. This is also reflected in the dominant contribution of low-frequency photons to the extragalactic background light. Finally, we briefly discuss how this perspective may inform us on the possibility of the existence of life elsewhere in the universe.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种结合物质粒子与光子的全局熵定义，指出恒星和星系等结构通过辐射光子高效产熵，从而在耗散系统中促进有序结构形成；主序星和星系恒星形成主序均表现出趋同的单位质量熵产率，表明宇宙结构演化本质上是第二定律驱动的熵增过程。
AI.motivation: 在耗散系统（如恒星或星系）中，辐射光子与物质解耦，可视为封闭系统的一部分，适用热力学第二定律；但传统熵定义常忽略辐射贡献，本文旨在构建包含物质与辐射（光子气体）的全局熵框架，以解释宇宙中有序结构如何与熵增一致。
AI.method: 采用统计物理方法定义全局熵，将辐射建模为光子气体；分析主序恒星在赫罗图上的比熵产率与光子产出，并推广至星系尺度的恒星形成主序；结合宇宙背景光谱特征讨论熵产的频率依赖性。
AI.result: 发现主序恒星在其主序寿命内产生近似相等的单位质量比熵和光子数，表明赫罗图主序是一条趋向普适比熵产率的收敛轨迹；星系尺度的恒星形成主序亦呈现类似规律；低频光子主导河外背景光，印证结构通过‘切割’高能光子为低能光子高效产熵。
AI.conclusion: 宇宙中恒星、星系等有序结构的形成并非违背热力学第二定律，而是其自然体现——这些结构作为高效熵发生器，通过辐射（尤其是低频光子）推动全局熵增长；该视角也为地外生命存在的可能性提供了基于熵产效率的思考线索。

title: Few-particle lepton bound states in variational approach
summary: The energy levels of the ground states of the three-particle and four-particle bound states of leptons in quantum electrodynamics are calculated. For the calculation, the variational method with Gaussian basis functions is used. The hyperfine structure of the spectrum is taken into account due to the pairwise spin-spin interaction of particles.

AI.tldr: 本文使用高斯基函数的变分法计算了量子电动力学中三粒子和四粒子轻子束缚态基态的能量级，并考虑了粒子间自旋-自旋相互作用引起的超精细结构。
AI.motivation: 研究轻子多粒子束缚态的能级及其超精细结构，以深化对量子电动力学中多体相互作用的理解。
AI.method: 采用基于高斯基函数的变分法进行计算，并纳入两两粒子间的自旋-自旋相互作用以处理超精细结构。
AI.result: 得到了三粒子和四粒子轻子束缚态基态的能量级数值结果。
AI.conclusion: 该方法可有效处理轻子多体束缚态的能级与超精细结构问题，为相关高精度理论预测提供支持。

title: Two-dimensional metallicity distribution of the ionized gas in NGC 628 and NGC 6946
comment: 41 pages, 18 figures, old paper not in Arxiv
summary: We present here two H II region catalogues with azimuthal resolution for the two grand design galaxies NGC 628 and NGC 6946. With the help of these catalogues, we study several properties of the star-forming processes occurring in spiral galaxies. We obtained direct imaging in the narrow-band filters centred at Hα, H\b{eta}, [O II]λ3727, and [O III]λλ4959, 5007 and their respective continua. After the calibration and correction of the data, we obtained for each H II region the de-reddened fluxes in the aforementioned lines, the size, the Hα equivalent width, and, using two different empirical calibrations, the metallicity. Employing a method based on the Delaunay triangulation, a two-dimensional (2D) representation of the metallicity was obtained. Data for 209 H II regions of NGC 628 and 226 H II regions of NGC 6946 are obtained. The radial behaviours of the Hα equivalent width, the excitation, and the oxygen abundance are derived. Two-dimensional representations of the metallicity and the excitation are calculated for the galaxies in the study. The two empirical calibrations of the metallicity are compared. The oxygen abundance gradients obtained in this study agree with previously published values. However, more regions were examined than in previous studies. We find a difference of about 0.6 dex between the two empirical calibrations employed. Finally, the 2D representations of the metallicity reveal high metallicity knots in NGC 628, and for NGC 6946 a high metallicity azimuthal structure is discovered. These high metallicity regions seem to be linked to the arms of the galaxies and are probably produced by an increase in the temperature of the ionizing clusters in the H II regions, which may be linked to variations in the initial mass functions of the galaxies between the arm and interarm regions.

AI.tldr: 本文构建了NGC 628和NGC 6946两个旋涡星系的高方位角分辨率H II区星表，通过窄带成像观测获得多条发射线流量、尺寸、Hα等效宽度及金属丰度等参数，并利用Delaunay三角剖分法实现金属丰度二维分布绘图，揭示了与旋臂相关的高金属丰度团块和方位结构。
AI.motivation: 理解旋涡星系中恒星形成过程的空间分布特性，特别是金属丰度在径向和方位角方向上的变化规律及其物理起源。
AI.method: 对NGC 628和NGC 6946进行Hα、Hβ、[O II]λ3727、[O III]λλ4959,5007及连续谱窄带成像；校准并消光改正后提取各H II区的消光校正发射线流量、尺寸、Hα等效宽度；采用两种经验标定方法估算氧丰度；利用Delaunay三角剖分构建金属丰度二维分布图。
AI.result: 获得209个（NGC 628）和226个（NGC 6946）H II区的多参数数据；确认氧丰度梯度与先前研究一致但样本更大；发现两种金属丰度标定结果相差约0.6 dex；首次揭示NGC 628存在高金属丰度团块、NGC 6946存在高金属丰度方位结构，且均与旋臂相关。
AI.conclusion: H II区金属丰度的二维分布呈现显著非均匀性，其高丰度特征可能源于旋臂内电离星团温度升高，进而反映臂与际臂区域初始质量函数（IMF）的差异。

title: Stellar-mass black holes in young massive and open stellar clusters -- VII. Comparisons with gravitational-wave events until LVK-O4a and Gaia compact binaries
comment: 34 pages, 20 figures, including Appendix content. Submitted. Comments are welcome
summary: Gravitational-wave (GW) detections by the LIGO-Virgo-KAGRA (LVK) observatories suggest multiple formation channels for GW compact binary mergers. Here I assess the role of young massive clusters (YMC) evolving into old open clusters (OC) -- the YMC/OC channel -- to the GW merger population. A homogeneous grid of 90 N-body evolutionary model star clusters, spanning initial masses of $10^4M_\odot\leq M_{cl}(0)\leq10^5M_\odot$, half-mass radii of 1-3 pc, and metallicities between 0.0002-0.02 is computed with the direct, post-Newtonian N-body code NBODY7. The N-body simulations include primordial binaries, delayed stellar-remnant model forming black holes (BH) and neutron stars (NS), BH spin prescriptions, and GW recoil kicks, and they are evolved until BH depletion. Most GW mergers from the cluster models are dynamically assembled binary black holes (BBH) that merge within their host clusters. Merger mass ratios reach down to 0.1-0.2 despite an overall bias toward nearly symmetric pairs. The GW merger efficiency varies non-monotonically with cluster mass, peaking around $M_{cl}(0)=7.5\times10^4M_\odot$ and also for $M_{cl}(0)\leq3.0\times10^4M_\odot$. The computed mergers reproduce some of the key features of the latest observed GW event catalogue, including asymmetric low-mass mergers, misaligned events among highly spinning, massive BHs, and an excess of $30M_\odot$ primaries, though they under-produce $10M_\odot$ primaries, hinting at contributions from other channels. The model merger rate density accounts for 25%-33% of the observed rate; it increases with redshift somewhat faster than the cosmic star formation, consistently with LVK's inferences. The model effective spin distribution is positively asymmetric at zero redshift and broadens with redshift. The models yield field BH- and NS-main sequence star binaries with parameters consistent with the Gaia-discovered candidates. [Abgd.]

AI.tldr: 本文通过90组N体数值模拟，研究了年轻大质量星团（YMC）演化为老年疏散星团（OC）这一通道对引力波致密双星并合事件的贡献，发现该通道可解释约25%-33%的观测并合率，并能再现部分关键观测特征（如质量不对称、自旋错向、~30倍太阳质量黑洞主导等），但低估了~10倍太阳质量黑洞的产生。
AI.motivation: 引力波探测揭示致密双星并合存在多种形成机制，需定量评估年轻大质量星团经演化成为疏散星团（YMC/OC）这一通道的贡献。
AI.method: 采用包含后牛顿力学、初生双星、延时致密残骸模型、黑洞自旋设定及引力波反冲的直接N体代码NBODY7，对90组初始质量10⁴–10⁵ M⊙、半质量半径1–3 pc、金属丰度0.0002–0.02的星团进行演化模拟，直至黑洞耗尽。
AI.result: YMC/OC通道可贡献25%–33%的观测引力波并合率；并合效率随初始星团质量呈非单调变化，在~7.5×10⁴ M⊙和≤3.0×10⁴ M⊙处出现峰值；能再现低质量比、高自旋错向、~30 M⊙主星等观测特征，但低估~10 M⊙主星；有效自旋分布零红移时正偏，随红移展宽；生成的场星BH/NS-主序星双星与Gaia发现候选体一致。
AI.conclusion: YMC/OC通道是引力波双黑洞并合的重要形成机制之一，能解释观测中多项关键统计特征及红移演化趋势，但需结合其他通道（如孤立双星演化）才能完整刻画整体并合种群。

title: Massive disk galaxies with high surface brightness plus low surface brightness stellar disks, hosted by massive dark matter halo -- a TNG50 simulation study
comment: This was accepted for publication in the International Astronomical Union Proceedings Series ( IAU General Assembly, August- 2024, Cape Town, South Africa)
summary: We study massive disk galaxies (total stellar mass$>=10^{11}$ $\mathrm{M_{\odot}}$) from IllustrisTNG50 simulation, and perform 2-D structural decomposition of the galaxies using their idealised, synthetic SDSS images for z=0. We find an interesting sample of galaxies having a central high surface brightness (HSB) stellar disk, surrounded by an extended low surface brightness (LSB) stellar disk, similar to giant LSB galaxies. These massive, double-exponential disk galaxies are found to be hosted by dark matter haloes of $\sim 10^{12} \mathrm{M_{\odot}}$ in agreement to observations of such galaxies. Their maximum rotation velocity, an approximate measure of their dynamical mass, lies within $\sim$ (300-500) km/s. The stellar-to-dark matter mass ratio and the baryon-to-dark matter mass ratio of the sample lies in the range of $\sim$ (0.04 - 0.46) and $\sim$ (0.07 - 0.47) respectively. Our results show that cosmological simulations are able to form disc galaxies with HSB plus LSB disks, as in observations.

AI.tldr: 本文利用IllustrisTNG50模拟研究了高恒星质量（≥10¹¹ M⊙）盘星系，通过合成SDSS图像进行二维结构分解，发现一类具有中心高面亮度（HSB）盘+外围低面亮度（LSB）盘的“双指数盘”星系，其暗物质晕质量约10¹² M⊙，旋转速度300–500 km/s，恒星/暗物质与重子/暗物质质量比分别约为0.04–0.46和0.07–0.47，表明当前宇宙学模拟可成功再现观测中此类特殊盘星系。
AI.motivation: 探究宇宙学模拟能否再现观测中罕见的、兼具中心高面亮度（HSB）与外围低面亮度（LSB）的巨型盘星系结构。
AI.method: 基于IllustrisTNG50模拟提取z=0时总恒星质量≥10¹¹ M⊙的盘星系，生成理想化SDSS波段合成图像，并对其开展2维结构分解以识别HSB+LSB双指数盘成分。
AI.result: 发现一批符合观测特征的双指数盘星系：宿主暗晕质量~10¹² M⊙，最大旋转速度300–500 km/s，恒星/暗物质质量比0.04–0.46，重子/暗物质质量比0.07–0.47。
AI.conclusion: IllustrisTNG50模拟能自然产生具有HSB+LSB双盘结构的 massive disk galaxies，支持该类星系可在标准ΛCDM框架下形成。

title: Analysis of Galactic cirrus filaments in HSC-SSP high-resolution deep images using artificial neural networks
comment: 42 pages, 21 figures. This is a preprint of the article accepted for publication in Astronomy and Computing (Elsevier). The final published version is available at DOI: https://doi.org/10.1016/j.ascom.2026.101075
summary: The existence of Galactic optical cirrus poses a challenge for observing faint objects within our Galaxy and dim extragalactic structures. To investigate individual cirrus filaments in the Hyper Suprime-Cam Subaru Strategic Program public data release 3 (HSC-SSP DR3) we use a technique based on convolutional neural networks and ensemble learning. This approach allows us to distinguish cirrus filaments from foreground and background objects across the entire HSC-SSP, using optical images in the $g$, $r$, and $i$ wavebands. A comparison with previous work using deep Sloan Digital Sky Survey Stripe~82 (SDSS Stripe~82) data reveals that the cirrus clouds identified in this study are highly consistent in location within the overlapping survey region. However, in the deeper HSC-SSP dataset, we were able to detect $4.5$ times more cirrus clouds. Our study indicates that the sky background in HSC-SSP coadd images is over-subtracted, as evidenced by the surface brightness distribution in cirrus filaments and surrounding regions. Objects with surface brightness of $m = 29~\mbox{mag~arcsec}^{-2}$ near large filaments can be dimmed by over-subtraction of $0.5$ magnitude in the $r$ band. This suggests that cirrus clouds should be taken into account in algorithms for estimating the sky background. For practical use, we provide a catalog of filaments and a framework that allows one to train neural network models for segmenting cirri in HSC-SSP coadd images.

AI.tldr: 本文利用卷积神经网络与集成学习方法，在HSC-SSP DR3光学数据中识别银河系光学星云（cirrus）细丝结构，发现比SDSS Stripe 82多4.5倍的星云，并指出HSC图像存在天光背景过减问题，影响暗弱目标测光，同时提供星云细丝星表与可复用的分割模型框架。
AI.motivation: 银河系光学星云（cirrus）干扰对银河系内暗弱天体及河外微弱结构的观测，亟需在大视场光学巡天数据中准确识别并量化其影响。
AI.method: 基于卷积神经网络（CNN）与集成学习技术，利用HSC-SSP DR3的g、r、i波段共加图像对星云细丝进行像素级分割，并与SDSS Stripe 82结果交叉验证；同时分析星云区域与邻近背景的表面亮度分布以评估天光减法偏差。
AI.result: 在HSC-SSP中识别出大量星云细丝，数量为SDSS Stripe 82重叠区的4.5倍；发现HSC共加图像存在系统性天光过减，导致亮达29 mag arcsec⁻²的天体在r波段被压低约0.5等；提供了公开的星云细丝星表及可训练的CNN分割框架。
AI.conclusion: 光学星云是影响深度成像数据天光背景建模的关键因素，必须在背景扣除算法中显式建模；本工作为后续巡天数据处理与暗弱源探测提供了实用工具与重要修正依据。

title: Resolved Dust Emission and CO Isotopologues in Giant Molecular Clouds of the Andromeda Galaxy
summary: Dust emission at submillimeter wavelengths can be used to reliably trace the basic properties of molecular clouds. Early results from a recent Submillimeter Array (SMA) survey of the Andromeda Galaxy (M31) include the first detections of resolved dust continuum emission from individual giant molecular clouds (GMCs) in an external spiral galaxy. This paper updates on the now-complete SMA survey of 80 Herschel-identified giant molecular associations (GMAs) in M31. The SMA survey simultaneously probes dust continuum emission at 230 GHz and the $J = 2 \rightarrow 1$ transitions of the CO isotopologues, $^{12}\rm CO$, $^{13}\rm CO$, and $\rm C^{18}O$ at a spatial resolution of $\lesssim 15~\mathrm{pc}$. Dust continuum emission was detected in 71 cloud cores, of which 26 were resolved. This more than doubles the size of the previous sample. By comparing dust and CO observations with identical astrometry, we directly measure the dust mass to-light ratios, $\rm α^{\prime}_{^{12}CO}$, and $\rm α^{\prime}_{^{13}CO}$. We derive $<α^{\prime}_{\rm ^{12}\rm CO}>~=~0.070~\pm~0.031~M_{\odot}\,(\rm K~km~s^{-1}~pc^{2})^{-1}$ and $<α^{\prime}_{\rm ^{13}\rm CO}>~=~0.37~\pm~0.20~M_{\odot}\,(\rm K~km~s^{-1}~pc^{2})^{-1}$ for the increased sample, which are in agreement with previously reported values. From virial analysis, we find that 80% of the GMC regions traced by resolved dust emission are bound and close to virial equilibrium. Finally, we update our analysis on the metallicity dependence of $\rm α^{\prime}_{\rm CO}$ by combining SMA observations with existing MMT/Hectospec optical spectroscopy toward H II regions. We find no trend in $\rm α^{\prime}_{\rm CO}$ with metallicity, supporting the previous findings.

AI.tldr: 本文更新了对M31中80个赫歇尔识别的巨分子关联体（GMAs）的SMA巡天结果，探测到71个云核的尘埃连续谱辐射（其中26个被分辨），并结合CO同位素观测，测定了尘埃质量与CO光度比α′，发现其与先前结果一致；多数GMC处于束缚和近引力平衡状态；且未发现α′_CO随金属丰度变化的趋势。
AI.motivation: 利用亚毫米波尘埃辐射可靠示踪分子云基本性质，并扩展此前在M31中对单个巨分子云（GMC）的首次分辨探测成果。
AI.method: 开展完整的SMA巡天，对M31中80个赫歇尔识别的巨分子关联体（GMAs）进行230 GHz尘埃连续谱及^{12}CO、^{13}CO、C^{18}O（J=2→1）谱线观测，空间分辨率≤15 pc；通过尘埃与CO数据的精确位置匹配，直接测定α′_{^{12}CO}和α′_{^{13}CO}；结合速度弥散与尺度做维里分析；联合MMT/Hectospec光学光谱数据研究α′_{CO}的金属丰度依赖性。
AI.result: 71个云核探测到尘埃连续谱（26个分辨），样本规模超先前两倍；测得<α′_{^{12}CO}> = 0.070 ± 0.031 M⊙/(K km s⁻¹ pc²)，<α′_{^{13}CO}> = 0.37 ± 0.20 M⊙/(K km s⁻¹ pc²)；80%被分辨尘埃辐射的GMC区域处于束缚且近维里平衡；未发现α′_{CO}与金属丰度的相关性。
AI.conclusion: SMA高分辨率尘埃与CO联合观测显著提升了M31中GMC物理性质的测量精度；所获α′值支持已有标定；维里分析表明多数GMC引力束缚；α′_{CO}无明显金属丰度依赖，暗示其在星系尺度上具有较好普适性。

title: Physical properties of circumnuclear ionising clusters. IV. NGC 1097
comment: 14 pages, 10 figures, Submitted to Astronomy & Astrophysics
summary: The circumnuclear star-forming ring of the barred spiral galaxy NGC 1097 provides a unique laboratory to study star formation under extreme conditions. This work aims to derive the physical properties of the circumnuclear star-forming regions (CNSFRs) using MUSE integral field spectroscopy observations. A total of 24 individual ionised HII are identified and analysed within its ring, which spans from $\sim$385 pc to $\sim$1.3 kpc. Despite the complex nuclear activity, all HII regions are found to be purely photoionised. Directly derived abundances reveal supersolar metallicities, with the highest one exceeding five times the solar value (12+log(S/H) = 7.875 $\pm$ 0.353, T$_e$([SIII]) = 3912 $\pm$ 567 K), and representing the highest abundance reported to date. In this high-metallicity regime, we find a break in the ionisation parameter-[SII]/[SIII] relation, which can be explained by changes in the ionisation structure and line emissivities, as confirmed by photoionisation models that successfully reproduce the observed emission-line ratios. Our results also indicate that the local gas supply regulates the star formation activity within the ring, with the young stars ionising 8 % of the total gas in the ring. Furthermore, our findings support a propagating starburst scenario, originating in the galaxy nucleus and extending towards the ends of the bar and into the circumnuclear ring through bar-driven shocks, this being consistent with the results of previous multi-wavelength studies. Finally, we likely detect optical signatures associated with one of the two known jets in this galaxy. This finding, together with the radio core emission previously found at sub-parsec scales, reflects the presence of feedback processes operating even on small galactic disc scales.

AI.tldr: 本研究利用MUSE积分场光谱观测，分析了棒旋星系NGC 1097核周恒星形成环中24个电离HII区的物理性质，发现其具有迄今报道的最高金属丰度（超太阳5倍），并揭示了高金属丰度下电离参数与[SII]/[SIII]比值关系的断裂、气体供给调控恒星形成、传播式星暴起源及小尺度反馈过程（如喷流光学特征）等关键结果。
AI.motivation: NGC 1097的核周恒星形成环是研究极端条件下恒星形成的独特实验室，亟需通过高空间分辨率光谱观测厘清其电离机制、化学丰度、恒星形成调控方式及活动星系核反馈影响。
AI.method: 基于MUSE积分场光谱数据，识别并分析环内24个独立电离HII区；采用直接方法测定丰度；结合光致电离模型解释谱线比值异常；综合多波段结果探讨星暴传播与反馈机制。
AI.result: 1）所有HII区均为纯光致电离；2）发现迄今最高金属丰度（12+log(S/H)=7.875±0.353）；3）高金属丰度下电离参数-[SII]/[SIII]关系出现断裂；4）本地气体供给调控环内恒星形成，年轻恒星电离环中8%气体；5）支持从星系核出发、经棒驱动激波向环传播的星暴模型；6）探测到可能与已知喷流相关的光学信号，表明存在小尺度反馈。
AI.conclusion: NGC 1097核周环处于极端高金属丰度环境，其恒星形成受气体供给与动力学结构共同调控，并伴随显著的AGN反馈效应；该结果对理解星系中心区域恒星形成与核活动协同演化具有重要意义。

title: Generalized Families of QFTs
summary: RG flows and IR phases of QFTs can be constrained by generalized symmetries and their anomalies. Broken symmetries act on the space of coupling constants of families of theories, and can also have IR-constraining family anomalies. We generalize family anomaly considerations to cases of broken generalized/categorical symmetries, including higher-group and non-invertible symmetries. We consider the anomaly inflow and SymTFTs of such generalized families of QFTs, and their implications for RG flows and constraints on the IR phases. As examples, we apply family anomalies to study the IR phases of $4d$ QCD-like theories deformed by irrelevant, multi-fermion interactions.

AI.tldr: 本文推广了家族反常（family anomalies）的概念，将其应用于破缺的广义/范畴对称性（包括高群和非可逆对称性），并利用反常流入与对称性拓扑场论（SymTFT）研究其对量子场论RG流及红外相的约束。
AI.motivation: 利用广义对称性及其反常来约束量子场论的重整化群流（RG flows）和红外相（IR phases），特别是将家族反常分析拓展至破缺的广义/范畴对称性情形。
AI.method: 将家族反常分析推广至破缺的高群和非可逆对称性；结合反常流入机制与对称性拓扑场论（SymTFT）框架，分析其对RG流与红外相的约束；以4维QCD类理论受无关多费米子相互作用形变为具体示例进行应用。
AI.result: 建立了破缺广义对称性下的家族反常理论框架；揭示了其通过SymTFT和反常流入对RG流路径与可能红外相施加的新约束；在4d QCD-like理论中展示了该方法对确定红外相的有效性。
AI.conclusion: 破缺的广义/范畴对称性同样可携带具有物理效应的家族反常，为理解量子场论的RG流结构与红外相提供了新工具和深刻约束。

title: SDSS-V Local Volume Mapper (LVM): Helix Nebula public data, Data Analysis Pipeline data products
comment: 20 pages, 12 figures, accepted for publishing in RMxA&A
summary: We present a spatially resolved spectroscopic analysis of the Helix Nebula (NGC 7293) using data from the SDSS-V Local Volume Mapper (LVM), by applying the recently developed LVM Data Analysis Pipeline (LVM-DAP). Covering the full optical range (3600-9800 Å) over a contiguous ~ 0.5 degree field, the LVM data provide the first hexagonally sampled, wide-field emission-line maps of all major ionic species in this archetypal planetary nebula. The resulting flux, kinematic, and line-ratio maps reveal the well-known ionization stratification of the nebula, from the compact He++ core to the bright [O III] ring and the extended low-ionization envelope, enabling a detailed comparison with classical aperture spectroscopy. Owing to the sensitivity and uniform spatial sampling of the LVM, numerous faint auroral and diagnostic lines are detected across the nebula, including [O III] 4363, [N II] 5755, and He I lines, allowing precise measurements of weak-line morphology. The derived radial trends confirm the remarkably low dust content and the overall homogeneity of electron temperature and density across the main ring. Ionized-gas kinematics traced by Hα further support the scenario of a slowly expanding, limb-brightened shell consistent with previous studies. This work demonstrates the diagnostic power of LVM spectroscopy for extended nebulae and highlights its capability to recover both global and spatially resolved physical conditions across complex ionized structures.

AI.tldr: 本文利用SDSS-V本地体积测绘器（LVM）数据和LVM数据分析流程（LVM-DAP），对行星状星云Helix Nebula进行了空间分辨光谱分析，首次获得其全光学波段宽视场发射线图，并揭示了电离分层结构、电子温度/密度均匀性及气体运动学特征。
AI.motivation: 为实现对行星状星云等延展天体进行高灵敏度、均匀空间采样的宽视场光谱观测，以克服传统狭缝或光纤光谱的空间覆盖与采样限制。
AI.method: 使用SDSS-V LVM在3600–9800 Å波段获取Helix Nebula的连续约0.5度视场积分场光谱数据，结合LVM-DAP进行空间分辨的谱线拟合与物理量反演（如流量、速度场、线比、Te、ne），并对比经典孔径光谱结果。
AI.result: 获得了主要离子谱线（如[O III]、He II、[N II]）的高信噪比空间分布图；探测到多条微弱禁戒线（如[O III] 4363、[N II] 5755、He I）；确认主环区电子温度与密度高度均匀、尘埃含量极低；Hα运动学显示缓慢膨胀且边缘增亮的壳层结构。
AI.conclusion: LVM光谱具备强大诊断能力，可同时刻画延展电离结构的全局性质与空间变化细节，为行星状星云及其他弥散天体的物理建模提供高质量基准数据。

title: Effects of Numerical Resolution on Simulated Cloud-Wind Interactions
comment: 14 pages, 7 figures, accepted for publication in ApJ
summary: Mixing by hydrodynamical instabilities plays a key role in cloud-wind interactions, causing cloud destruction in the adiabatic limit and facilitating cloud survival with efficient radiative cooling. However, the rate of mixing in numerical simulations is sensitive to the smallest resolved scale, and the relationship between resolution and cloud evolution is under-explored. Using a set of cloud-crushing simulations, we investigate the effects of numerical resolution on cloud survival and acceleration. Modeling both adiabatic and radiative cases, in a subsonic and supersonic wind, we find that cloud survival and velocity does depend on the numerical resolution, however, no single resolution requirement can be applied to all scenarios. In the radiative subsonic case, we find that mass growth and acceleration appear converged at only 4 cells per cloud radius. Conversely, in the supersonic regime, we see a clear dependence of cloud destruction and velocity on resolution that is not converged even at 48 cells per cloud radius, implying that accurately capturing cloud destruction may require higher resolution than capturing growth. We also present a simple model illustrating how ram pressure accelerates cool clouds at early times before mixing kicks in as an acceleration mechanism.

AI.tldr: 本文通过云破碎模拟研究了数值分辨率对云团生存和加速的影响，发现不同物理场景下所需的分辨率不同：亚音速辐射冷却情况下4个网格点/云半径即可收敛，而超音速情况下即使48个网格点/云半径仍未收敛，表明云破坏比云增长更依赖高分辨率。
AI.motivation: 数值模拟中混合速率对最小可分辨尺度敏感，但分辨率与云演化之间的关系尚缺乏系统研究。
AI.method: 采用一系列云破碎（cloud-crushing）数值模拟，涵盖绝热与辐射冷却、亚音速与超音速风等不同物理条件，系统分析分辨率（以每云半径网格数表征）对云质量演化和速度变化的影响，并构建简化的动压加速模型。
AI.result: 云生存与加速确实依赖数值分辨率；亚音速辐射情形在4 cells/radius即收敛，而超音速情形在48 cells/radius仍未收敛；早期云加速主要由动压主导，随后混合才起作用。
AI.conclusion: 不存在统一适用于所有场景的分辨率要求；准确刻画云破坏所需分辨率高于云增长；早期云加速机制以动压为主，混合效应滞后。
